description: OKNOTOK is a multi-purpose venue featuring a variety of surprising events all week, including Ruby's Power Hour, the Disney-Sing-Along, a nightly funeral.
name: OKNOTOK

description:
If you are a dreamer, come in,
If you are a dreamer, a wisher, a liar,
A hope-er, a pray-er, a magic bean buyer…
If you're a pretender, come sit by my fire
For we have some flax-golden tales to spin.
Come in!
Come in!
name: Where The Sidewalk Ends

description:
WeCharge! is the next evolution of the camp formerly known as bEEcHARGE!!! and before that rEcHARGE!!!.  We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more! 

This year please come by to sing your lungs out with Live Band Karaoke, or to hop on to a Playa Adventure Tour (guided shenanigans), or to visit the Moonshine Bar with the Golden Guy cluster, or to hop on one of our two art cars:  the Apis Inlusio and the Red Hot Beverly.

Bottom line, stop by and visit!  We welcome all, especially newbees and travelers from afar!
name: WeCharge!

description: We at silver spoon cafe will feed you. When you sit down at one of our tables you get to be spoon fed a small but delicious meal by one of our servers. All we ask is that you consider leaving us a life tip. It can be about relationships, loss, technology or just food; anything goes. Oh, and we can also spoon you a tasty drink in case you're not hungry.
name: The Silver Spoon

description: Say "Cheese" and enter our Electric Cheese Land, where delicious fondue and other cheese dishes are being served.
name: Electric Cheese Land

description:
Camp Bang Bang is a community of open hearted and open armed adventurers from Australia and around the Globe. 

We welcome you to our playground where you can play & drink. Music, laughs, dancing, Aussie-ness and if you are unlucky  eat vegemite. Scale our Viewing Tower, Climb into our Harmony Hammocks, zone out trying to understand what we are saying, dare not to eat Vegemite at Risk & Reward Saloon and spin TWoR (The Wheel or Risk).

Or came for our Monday Gardens of Babylon Landing ceremony & music experience and get down on Wednesday with Wild Animal Party. 

Not there to party, join us for Hot Mess Yoga or our Immersive VR Fear Healing.

Heck we even do a back street bike bandits tour to help you with your cardio-ish. 

Hometown: Sydney, Australia. With strong links in Los Angeles, New York, England, Sweden, Netherlands, Hong Kong, Singapore, Mexico City, Italy, Uruguay, Spain & Bali just to name a few.
name: Camp Bang Bang

description: The Last Starfighter is an art support camp filled with lovers of science fiction. Stop by our porch if you need a good book for your burn or a good conversation about science fiction & futurism.  We are supporting the Augmented Reality Porta Potty's this year.  You may see us riding to and from deep playa on our ARP support bike.
name: The Last Starfighter

description: Syncytium is a collection of artists, engineers, scientists and performers who do. We work hard together and play hard together. Stop by for some frozen goodness during the day, or at night to heat yourself up when you're cold.
name: Syncytium

description: Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge will be quenching your midday thirst with happy hours featuring ice-cold champagne. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski! Bring your own cup, and be ready for booze, music, and fun! Also check out Champagne Lounge Audio Programing, or the C.L.A.P, on your radio at 99.9 fm!
name: Champagne Lounge

description: The Lavender Lounge provides tired and exhausted guests with a Lavender water misting and scalp massage treatment. Take a break from the dust and sun, come in, and get LAVENDERIZED!
name: The Lavender Lounge

description: Hot miso soup and sake by night, fresh insight into sex positivity and expression by day.
name: Miso! (formerly Miso Horny)

description: Camp aLittle! Where there's aLittle something for everyone!
name: aLittle

description: A Swiss Chalet for travelers from Switzerland and expatriates.
name: Swiss Chalet

description: Toast & Jam invites you to drop into your neighborhood watering hole and enjoy some good ol' fashioned live music. There's one drink on the menu: BEER SHOTS, and every shot is accompanied with a toast. So come one, come all, share a laugh, learn to toast in a new language, form a band with your newfound friends. You will find yourself always coming back to Toast & Jam!
name: Toast & Jam

description: When the harsh Playa takes its toll on your lips and on your soul... come see Lip Service for bad advice and chapstick!
name: Lip Service

description:
Dusty Pineapple is a tropical oasis for burners looking to connect, share, learn, and celebrate! Come by our camp for yoga, hip-hop Pilates, Tarot reading, outer-space talks, absurd games, and pineapple drinks. 

The Dusty Pineapple is home to the "DP", which ventures out at sunset to the farthest corners of the deep Playa to provide wandering burners the joy of discovering a tiny oasis of light, groovy jams, and camaraderie where it's least expected. The DP does not disclose their locations in the deep Playa or timing (but if you hang out at camp, we may give you a clue). Rather, we prefer to be that moment you find by chance.   We look forward to you stumbling upon us along your journey in BRC or the Deep Playa!
name: Dusty Pineapple

description: The Good & Stormy Scoundrels come from Los Angeles.  We are fire spinners, artists, teachers, and mischief makers.  Come sit in our shade and we may show you a thing or two.
name: The Good & Stormy Scoundrels

description:
A diverse group, coming together in an efficient & sustainable design that inspires individuals and camps and allows us to give back more.

That and...

We are an epic camp
That does epic shit.
Full of epic people.
name: EPIC

description: Emergency Services & Rampart, Medical clinic
name: Emergency Services & Rampart

description: A.S.S. Camp (Art of Such n Such) is home base for the honorarium project UNCLE CHARLIE'S RED HOT COCK. Stop by, & say hello to check our nightly burn schedule to join us for fiery late night fun at the honorarium piece.
name: Art of Such n Such (A.S.S.) Camp

description: VW Bus Camp and Leopard Lounge is happy and thankful to be able to share our dusty collection of iconic old VW campers and our inviting and playful Leopard Lounge and Day Spa with citizens of BRC for our 21st Burn. Returning are favorite projects like the Grateful Dyed tie dye party, Hoop Jam and the new acts that you'll need to visit to see!
name: VW Bus Camp and Leopard Lounge

description: ESD Station 3 is the home of the Black City Fire Department. Everyone is welcome to meet the volunteers of BRC fire department. BRCFD provides 24/7 emergency response to the city. We have 2 staffed engines, and a rescue/HazMat truck. Our firefighters come from all over the world to share their skills and expertise with BRC.
name: Emergency Services Station 3

description: Battlestar Erotica is a camp designed to get you in touch with yourself and other through bondage classes, yoga classes, dance parties, and dare boards. Come make new friends and remind yourself why you are your favorite friend of all!
name: Battlestar Erotica

description: Nothing can be something worth doing. Our camp is a day-time refuge for anyone with a serious case of lounge syndrome. Stop by for a tiny drink in our tiny dome, a larger drink in our larger dome, or simply stay for the hammock therapy with our carefully curated grooves.
name: Lounge Syndrome

description: Stardust Lounge is an eclectic pit stop for dusty travelers on their inter-playatary journeys. The three sections of the camp--the Casino, Spa, and Wedding Chapel--offer visitors a fun blend of rituals, games, and opportunities for self-care.
name: Stardust Lounge

description:
Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a gay
community oasis offering a fully functioning Gym, colorful art
installations and daily events including yoga classes,  inspiring performances, & quite queer nightlife.
name: Comfort & Joy

description: Fur Dome
name: Fur Dome

description: Sake To Me is your neighborhood sake bar! Stop by for a comfortable shady pitstop, some great chilled sake, and test your skills at a giant version of Jenga.
name: Sake To Me

description: Robots have taken over! Now the resistance has risen and you're either with us or against us. Come see which side you're on & party while you can!
name: Camp Aerial Screw

description: Born from confusion and tempered by mild incompetence, we're now beginning to feel ok about this whole endeavor!  Come lounge with us.
name: Skrambles**!*

description: Fox In The Box is the art support camp for the "Crowd Controls" LED art installation. Come say hi!
name: Fox In The Box

description: Being that we are Pink Fuzzy Monkeys we have a deep appreciation for our environment and the community that surrounds us.  We love to play, dance, and monkey around. Our lounge will be spinning tunes for every taste throughout the day. Our DJ sessions will be during sunset and, it's a more intimate experience, with a smaller 20x20 dance floor and smaller 600‐watt sound. We will have our 6th annual Super Hero Underwear Monkey Party with tasty monkey juice at our Monkey Bar. Throughout the week, we will keep the playa charged up with our fruit charging stations and entertained with our giant black light twister board. Three nights during the week we will have set Guest DJ's for our sunset parties and organize themed twister game nights. We are also holding a light saber battle to quench our thirst for swinging big sticks around.  With a large community shade structure we invite anyone to stop by and chill for a bit, get out of the sun, and meet new friends, any time of the day.
name: Pink Fuzzy Monkey

description: Antevasin means, 'one who lives at the border.' In ancient times, this was a literal description. It indicated a person who had left the bustling center of worldly life to go live at the edge of the forest where the spiritual masters dwelled. Camp Antevasin is the place to leave the bustling Black Rock City and venture into the unknown with us border dwellers.  Leave feeling better than when you came in...spiritually and physically!
name: Antevasin

description:
What Up, Doe? 
Straight from the Motor City!  Bringing all that is great about the Great Lake State to the Playa!  Come make the scene with a Michigangster lean!
name: Michigangsters of Detroit:(B)RC

description: Bitch'n'Tea - Serving up ice cold mate and the cold hard truth.
name: Bitch'n'Tea

description: The Community Improvement Association is an acknowledged leader in making Black Rock City a better place to live. Tune in to Community Improvement Radio, stop by to get information and a mission, and join us every afternoon for our Solar Salvation Concerts on solar musical instruments.
name: Community Improvement Association

description: A gathering of post-apocalyptic tribes and restless souls. We who wander this Wasteland, in search of our better selves.
name: The Wastelanders

description: The Black Rock Bardello is the biggest little theme camp on the playa. We are an eclectic group of Master Builders, Artists, Burlesque, Fire, Improv, and Fetish performers with a community spirit and a rocking bar.
name: Black Rock Bardello

description:
Inspiration Oasis is where you ending up somehow and you life change for ever.
the quality of the people that coming by our camp is the top of the top, maybe its because many of us are really connected in the facilitation of our culture year long for long time and we made a lot of amazing friends over the years.
Our goal is to represent our name correctly, and if we promised Inspiring Oasis this is what you will get as you come by our home.
hometown: Tel Aviv, Atlanta, Tulsa, Miami Florida
name: Inspiration Oasis

description: Plaisance Camp:  The pleasant place to be.  Our faux Frenchness will satisfy all your Francophile desires.
name: Plaisance Camp

description: Goooood morning playa people!! Come find us for good times with Stardust the Whale and Fjorgn. Located just north of the end of the Universe.
name: Sunrise Tavern

description: Heart Beats is a small playa family offering a cuddle dome with ambient and downtempo tunes aimed at opening the heart, mind, and soul. We're offering a safe space to relax and get real with music, daytime activities (Open mics! Mask painting!), and 24 hour good vibes. Lift your spirits, lift your neighbor's spirits, elevate the collective, and chill. Come by any morning after the event opens for some cold brew coffee.
name: Heart Beats

description: Bringing class and sophistication to the playa like never before.
name: Suburbia

description: "...And Then There's Only Elephants" Oh my, how we love them: In herds, and on carousels, in paint and on the Playa. Help us express our love for them...we'll show you ours, and you can show us yours. Trumpet one and all for elephants! Let's have some fun! This may seem irreverent, but elephants look strange, yet are the most compassionate animal on this planet. Humans are more strange - we can learn much from these loving creatures. Conventional approaches to saving elephants is not working - we need the unconventional! Be Unconventional - Join "I Love Elephants" theme camp at Burning Man!
name: I Love Elephants

description: Welcome to Snark Bar: Beverages will be $5, Wi-fi will be $10, and you have to speak to a Camp Leader for the price on fun. *Must provide your own Snark.
name: Snark Bar

description: Black Rock City's Playa Theater since 1998! Nightly video screenings on our two big screens. Body painting every afternoon in our shade structure. Cool off in our mister! Play with our oversized games. Drink at one of our daily themed Happy Hours. Robot and AI feature films chosen by the citizens of BRC (Come by and cast your vote.) Compete in one of our live Game Shows or come tell us your most scandalous gossip and you could end up on BMZ Extra! Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday night! Home of The 48 Hour Film Project BRC. Contact us if you have an original video you'd like to show, or are looking for a performance space. Located in Snowflake Village.
name: Videogasm

description: We believe in the power of saying YES. Doing it NOW. And PLEASE is just being nice while doing it! Is it a bar, is it a game? It's a GameBar!! Come by for happy hour nuttiness and climb all over the Monkey Rocker with your friends and go away with new ones!
name: Yes. Now. Please.

description: Celestial Bodies is your straight-friendly lounge bar in the gayborhood. Join us for daily activities and special events and enjoy one (or several) of our satisfying Playa Cosmo cocktails.
name: Celestial Bodies

description: Camp Orange (You Glad We Didn't Say Banana!) debuted in 2013, which makes this our SIXTH year on the Playa. Join us to gaze upon the glory of our 16-foot tall Banana Stand (find out for yourself if there's $$ inside) from which we'll bestow you with delicious frozen chocolate-covered BANANAS. Plus, we'll have happy hours throughout the week featuring our famous banana-rific cocktails, beer, and shots served from our covered bar and lounge area where you can sip on a the tasty beverage of your choice while reclining in one of our banana hammocks.
name: Camp Orange

description: CARAVAN OF LIGHT (COL) is first and foremost a "Leave no trace" Camp. We are composed of people from many different cultures coming together from around the World to host and share all our different Gifts of art, music, dance, visual & performance art hospitality, and a deeper understanding of community. In line with our BM Ethos of "Radical Inclusion", every Black Rock City Citizen who visits our Camp is always Welcomed!!!
name: Caravan of Light

description: Reservation only, fine-dining on the Playa!  Make a reservation and enjoy the best meal of your life!
name: EleVant Rising

description: The AstroPups - Fun, Frisky, n Fabulous! Exploring the PupVerse one lick at a time!
name: The AstroPups

description: Come join us and play the Pickle Game to spin the wheel and find out what YOU would do for a pickle! Spankings sold separately.
name: What Would You Do For A Pickle?

description: Experience bliss with our treatment of cucumbers, cool gel masks, mist, massage, and lavender eye pillows. Bathe in a multi-sensory experience by the enchanting powers of the Dilated Peoples.
name: Dilated Peoples

description: We are a comfortable neighborhood pub with a-rockin' attitude and groovin' tunes. In honor of His Noodly Goodness, the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice-cold libations for your mind, body, and spirit. We will also provide official and unofficial weddings in His Noodly Goodness' Temple. Come test your pole dancing skills, call almost anywhere in the world on our free public phone, or use our public Wi-Fi hotspot. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all so stop by, be touched by His noodly appendage, and stay awhile.
name: Temple O'Flying Spaghetti Monster

description: Come take a dive into all levels of your consciousness with the Deep Sea Divers! Play in our 40ft bounce arena, dance, watch mesmerizing psychedelic visuals, or join a cuddle puddle.
name: Deep Sea Divers

description: Bumble, Buzz and Humm in our Hive of  self expression, music, entertainment and dance parties!  Bee-friend our swarm over ice cold kombucha on tap every afternoon Monday-Saturday! Come fly and on our aerial silk acrobatic rig and show your STUFF on our spinning stripper pole! Our vibrant honey dome is a a place of sanctuary and visual stimulation, as well as a safe place to relax, practice yoga, meditate, escape the heat and make new friends!
name: Camp MisBeeHive

description: Skinny Kitty Teahouse - Tea and couches 24/7, improptu and scheduled performances throughout the week.
name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse

description:
Loveland culture means leading with love in all aspects of life on and off of the playa.
We are in community 365 days a year and pride ourselves on being accepting of new faces while still holding our firm boundaries to ensure that everyone feels seen and heard in a safe container of love. Our ethos celebrates owning our enthusiastic "yes" and our firm "no." We are constantly striving for positive radical self-improvement and use this platform to manage internal community conflicts. This is how we lead with love.  Loveland is a heartfelt container that invites everyone to step up into his or her higher self and shine. We also have a lot of fun doing it!  We  hold community fundraisers and seasonal parties that keep us connected in our culture and promote consent culture. 

https://www.facebook.com/loveland.brc/
name: Loveland

description: The Loveamorium is where we show you that we love you, and this year we are presenting "The Living Room," where we make the ordinary extraordinary. The Living Room is about being together with people who treat you like family, and that's how we are. When the Living Room is open daily, in-between our scheduled public events (tea time, jam sessions, daycare, and dinner) we'll be home and when you come in, we'll ask you if you want to take a load off and sit. We'll offer you a drink and a snack, and ask you about your day. You'll be treated like an old friend or family, even if it's the first time we've seen you in this life! We'll be home to welcome you home, and host you while you visit, and maybe you'll stay over - because who knows who might come for dinner!
name: Camp LoveAmorium

description: CRTT.0! Come play with us daily and see how we like to shake it up! Our themes rotate with our ADD.
name: CRRT.0

description:
Our theme camp's purpose is to create and display art in a variety of mediums that goes beyond being aesthetically pleasing or good feelings by eliciting intense emotions, that disrupt the viewer's state both positively and negatively, to open up new perspectives.  We strive to share art that challenges the way you see the world, with the intent to help each of us grow, as a person, both existentially and socially.

Art Gallery: The gallery is a result of communal effort from artists whose creations range from stunning mandalas, life size paintings of deep subject matters both political and social, provocative photography, and psychedelic 3D paintings.  Artists will be available to talk to visitors directly about the art.

Fantastical Metal Sculpture Garden:  A home to a menagerie of plants and creatures, this literal sculpture garden will be a place of escape, contemplation and wonderment where the fantastical beings of our imaginations, both dark and light, are brought to life.
name: Art of Disruption

description: Failure is the goal!  4 out of 5 dentists agree that the Unnecessarily High Five is the MOST DANGEROUS interactive art on the playa!
name: Unnecessarily High Five

description: We don't have green bread or a flying stone head, but we do have Cecil, the Flying Propeller Beanie. Pop by for a chat session at Lucy's psychiatry booth or linger to counsel others; all advice guaranteed to be disdained, disavowed or disallowed by the AMA, APA, and your CPA. Find us under the floating squid or avoid us and have an even better burn.
name: Vortex 4

description: Come by for some crazy nighttime sport activities. Refreshments may be served.
name: Yabba Dabba Do Me

description: Love Drippins is a fresh and playful take on the "alternative lifestyle" scene. Our play space is small and intimate and inclusive of all genders and sexual orientations provided all participants are consenting adults.
name: Love Drippins

description: Dust meets UFOs in this intergalactic Sci-Fi themed camp where we facilitate the arts and you dish-out the farts! MULTI PASS holders welcome.
name: ℋ¥ℙ∃ℝϟℙÅℭℰ

description: Come learn the basics of flow arts, fire safety and stand up comedy.
name: Friends United (FU)

description:
We co-opted the original Bronco chase with the intention of changing it's negative connotation to a postive one. White Bronco is now a spirit vehicle for appreciating recreation, innovation, and community. Come enjoy our DJ line-ups, interactive art project, and the 2nd Annual 7:30 sector Bronco Chase!
-CONNECT!
name: White Bronco

description: Ever wish you could shed your default self and be transported into a whole new world? Just follow the glow of the giant genie lamp to the Sacrificial Harem. Live the yurt life, enjoy tea and shisha, and participate in our sacrificial ceremonies (you'll have to trust us).
name: Sacrificial Harem

description: There's a giant fuqed up party happening at Farm Declusterfuqerization. What are you waiting for? Put on your boots, find your inner filthy party animal and get ready to blast some bluegrass in the city of dust!
name: Farm Declusterfuqerization

description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, The Saloon Ensemble, Love-Bomb Go-Go Marching Band, Trashcan Joe, and The Ukeladies are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era.  Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share in electronic-free acoustic joy! Lyrics included!
name: The Dump

description: Dead Hand Path leads to the beginning, or the end, of the world. Focused on existential risk to humanity and the occult, we offer conversations about potential apocali, tarot readings, and adore the Impermanent Robot. Stop by and witness the Fifth Horseman: Artificial Intelligence.
name: Dead Hand Path

description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need....to survive, refuel and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you'll find the Nectar you seek for any of them in the camps at our oasis.  Offerings continuously from 10am-6pm.
hometown: San Francisco, Boston, DC, Boulder, Brussels
name: Nectar Village

description: Hailing from the Original Muscle Beach in Santa Monica California Swing City embodies the ethics of fun, exercise, and shared movement which has been a part of OMB since the 1930's. Come play.
name: Swing City

description: Come "check" us out!! No ReGretzky's is a Canadian-American camp hosting hockey themed activities! Come play with our balls and sticks… we will even teach you how to use them!  Not into slipping one past our goalie? Come hang out with our scantily clad referees in our large shaded area with awesome music and lots of cozy things to lounge in.  Don't sit on the bench! Drop your gloves and come and get it!
name: No ReGretzky's

description: Harmonic Convergence is an intimate, spiritually-focused, Burning Man camp. We will host the Harmonic Cafe...open 10 am - 2 pm Monday thru Friday...8 pm - 10 pm Sunday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Sunday.
name: Harmonic Convergence Camp

description:
GYST- Get Your Shit Together
Sometimes you wanna go where they'll give you a name.
And we will. Come by for a cold bevvy or a brief breather
We're always welcoming and throwing shade, the good kind
Virgin burner training available
name: GYST- Get Your Shit Together

description: Cheesehead Camp shares Wisconsin Cheese, Beer, Sausage and kindness with the world.  Stop in and get out of the sun and spend some time with a couple of  folks from "America's Dairyland".
name: Cheesehead Camp

description: We bring together likeminded people from around the world in an effort to inspire, engage, and spread consciousness.
name: Sacbe Camp

description: Here at Playa Circuit Boogie we use circuits and science to spark ideas and bring strangers together, all while jamming out to groovy tunes. Come learn the basics of soldering and circuit building; ride away with your very own light-up pendant and the skills to make an even better one next year.
name: Playa Circuit Boogie

description: Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, flying space bar, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!
name: Kamp Kaos

description: Enjoy our LIVE PHISH jam Thursday. Smack down your northern neighbors on our Whack-Ca-Nuck game, grab a hat from our Chapeaupourri or play some tunes in our piano bar. Spreading Canadian love.
name: Camp Canadianderthal

description: Dusty Cantina - A little taste of a amazing culture.
name: Dusty Cantina

description: Hotel California is an oasis of generosity where all dusty playa visitors can come re-energize, rest and relax. All guests are welcome to experience our fabulous hospitality: come enjoy our Day Spa and our new EmpaTea Bar, take a class in our Workshop Space, or view panoramic sunsets and sunrises from our rooftop! We will offer Continental Breakfast in the morning, and host Happy Hour in the evening.  Our Pool and Cabanas will be open anytime for napping and lounging. Our giant glowing steel fire bowl will be on fire every night - warm up with us!
name: Hotel California

description: The Eighth Bearwhale has returned!
name: Bearwhalea

description: Nakked Zebra Bazaar is an interactive costuming and outfitting boutique. We provide burners with unique and stylish outfits that help guide them on their expressive journey through the week.
name: Nakked Zebra Bazaar

description: We are an information and acculturation camp! We will have art and information from past years about the history of Burning Man and the 10 Principals, but mostly our focus will be on the theme camps of Burning Man. The fabric off the city that makes this such a 'Cooltown'. We will parse the information about camps and share that with you. Did you know you can take a ballet class, get a henna tattoo, shoot tequila while you get your feet rubbed? I bet not! Wanna see a TED talk? What does 11:11 mean? Looking for a snuffaluffagus for that scavenger hunt... Look no further. All of this in a 20x30 misted shade structure. Our goal is to acculturate new burners and rejuvenate the old salty veteran. Discover your own path, or you can join us each afternoon as we hit the streets of Burning Man in a mobile misted shade structure and check out what makes Burning Man such a "Cooltown".
name: (Burning Man is a) Cooltown

description: Tetrix Village welcomes you to indulge in our Robot refuge. Rubber Armstrong’s illuminated dystopian spaceman helmet, Fuel up at the Gin-ious bar. Get your hardware and software teased at the Robot Repair Centre. Donate your bad ideas to the University of Interstellar Screw Ups. Get your bike looking cosmically rad at the Space Bike Pimp Station. Interact with Camp Meow's illuminated 15ft pyramid, controlled with an interactive joystick. Sunset excursions into deep playa on the raving interstellar art car “Stargazer” the brightest moving beacon on the playa!
name: Tetrix Village

description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!
name: The Hive

description: [TCWNN] is a suburban camp and an artistic dive bar at heart.  [The Bar With No Name] is open 24 hours a day and is a true international art-bar experience, with superb craft beers and ciders. The camp has a focus on interactivity and art projects from burners from around the world. We welcome virgin and orphan burners.  We are a camp of approximately 50 burners.
name: [The Camp With No Name]

description: Orphan Endorphin camp is a nexus of activity for robots and endorphins alike. This is the soul of the machine for cold libations, exotic cigars and games such as Lil Rocket Man.  Do you have what it takes to defeat Lil Rocket Man, come see us and find out.
name: Orphan Endorphin

description: Back To Camp is a summer camp inspired theme camp bringing a forest lounge, arts+crafts, postcards, games, cold beers, and campfire circles to citizens of Black Rock City. Don't you wanna go back to camp?
name: Back To Camp

description: Emergency Services Station 7:30 is the home camp for many of the ESD Communications volunteers. It is also the home of the Safety team and the Nevada Department of health
name: Emergency Services Station 7:30

description:
Our camp this year is inspired by the 2003 movie "The Triplets of Belleville."

Our installation will center around one scene in particular. In the scene, 4 Tour de France cyclists, abducted by the mafia, are smuggled into an underground gambling ring. Each cyclist is put onto a bike-like machine in front of a crowd of bettors. Each machine drives a miniature statue; the faster the cyclist pedals, the farther the statue goes along the "course". In the film, whenever a statue falls behind, the cyclist powering him is "taken out back" and you hear a loud bang. 

We'll be recreating this scene. You can ride up, hook up your bike, and see if you can get your horse to the finish line first. Any cyclists that fall behind will be "taken out back" and shot with a water gun.

To the side of the main event, we'll have a playa dome where cyclists can change into vintage jerseys. We'll even have an area for anyone who wants to shave their legs like a TRUE CYCLIST.
name: Dusty Disco

description: Come test your skills on the Burning Man Bike Course! A bicycle challenge obstacle course for all ages, abilities, genders, and sexual preferences.
name: Burning Man Bike Course

description: Camp NYCHI is a camp that represents the diversity and vibrancy of New York City, the city where we're from. While obviously the playa is worlds away from the bustling streets of the Big Apple, our camp is here to provide that NYC energy (or Chi) in our dusty home away from home. Camp NYCHI is so many things. It's a place to dance your face off all night, it's a place to get a late night sandwich with friends, it's a place to turn up and then wind down. If NYC is an apple, then we're simply a beautiful bite.
name: Camp NYCHI

description: Emergency Services Station at 4:30 & H will provide basic medical care, emergency communications, and transportation for participants requiring medical attention.
name: Emergency Services Station 4:30

description: F.E.R.N. camp is the home camp for Rampart staff
name: FERN (F**king ER Nurses)

description:
A Chill Lounge in the Suburbs
Come relax in the shade and try one of the special "Kiwi" drinks away from the hustle & bustle of the Esplanade
name: Vaude VIlle

description: home of the 360 swing and foam dome. voted funnest camp for yards in any direction
name: camp do nothing

description: The Dust Circus - A Twisted Mix of Entertainment! Real Magic, Dance, and Technology - moves your body and mind. Uncover your robot nature - or find your humanity!
name: Dust Circus

description: Home of Black Rock City's Department of Public Works.
name: The DPW Ghetto

description: Black Rock City Municipal Airport (88NV) is a real-live, daytime Airport located at Point 5 on the trash fence. Come visit on bike, on foot, or on Mutant Vehicle. Meet pilots, see planes, sing karaoke.
name: Airport - Point 5

description:
Kegel Kommandos - we're doing it now!
Featuring the 7th annual Friday Grilled Cheese and Bacon party and Thursday's 3rd Annual Black Rock City, Ding Dong Sing Song Beer Bong Ping Pong World Championships.  Table Tennis, beer and junk food – now that's something to sing about!
name: Kegel Kommandos

description: A group of international miscreants gathered together to celebrate and share the weirdness of life. The weirder the better!!
name: Frothin' Weirdos

description: Burbs is ESD's come as you are camp, it is open to ESD volunteers, friends and family who want to camp together in a less formal camp structure than at the stations. Minimal amenities. No portos, no water, just some shade and a place to camp and practice Radical Self Reliance
name: Burbs

description: The Coup de Foudre camp uses high voltage as an artistic medium producing light, music, and novel physical sensation. This year, our camp brings three installations centered on Sound, Light, and Touch. Each installation is enclosed in a dome inspired by the era of Edison and Tesla: intimately sized, lit by filament incandescent light, creating zones where the normal laws of physics do not quite apply.
name: Coup de Foudre

description: A landing pad for Moonbuggy, the rising crescent moon that glows as bright as the celestial orb in the sky.  Get lunar inside the moon, cosmonaut the day away in a space helmet, and defy gravity on the trampoline.
name: Mooner Landing

description:
Hmm, ballroom dancing AND emergency replacement batteries? What a winning combination. Come visit the WTF Ballroom & Battery X-Change Camp.

We are proud to provide both a cool activity and a cool service for all our Burner friends. Did you ever want to learn ballroom dancing? Here's your chance! Our WTF (Waltz, Tango, and Foxtrot) Ballroom instructors will teach you the very basic moves for the most popular ballroom dances.

But wait, there's more! Did you forget to turn off those LED lights last night and now you're in desperate need of AA, AAA, C, D, or 9V batteries? Well, look no more. Come on over for replacements. It's important that we dispose of all used batteries, so we kindly ask that you bring the dead ones with you. Our trained personnel will assist with all your battery needs. We even have a USB charging station if you need a quick recharge.
name: WTF Ballroom & Battery X-Change

description: Welcome one and all to Pam's Parlor, where you can find shade and get shiny with our custom flash tattoos designed specifically for this year's Burn, or enjoy other scheduled events such as yoga, meditation, body painting, and more! Please feel free to climb up onto the back of our art car to get a great view of the neighborhood at any time of day or night--we look forward to seeing you there!
name: Pam's Parlor

description:
Moop Map Headquarters is the Playa Restoration interactive education camp.

• Visit the Moop Gardens, learn about the most common types of Moop found during Playa Restoration.
• View GPS data and photos from past event site Restoration operations.
• Get familiar with the tools used to Leave No Trace on the Playa.
• See every Moop Map 2006 – 2017 on display.

Visit any evening after Sunset to enjoy the Fireside Circle, a place for the community to congregate around an open fire.
name: MOOP Map HQ

description: As immense as Walter is, he represents something even bigger. The power of imagination, the joy of discovery, and the spirit of service in which we undertake every project. Walter's story has a message for us all: there are second chances in life, your past doesn't determine your future, you are capable of more than you might think, and we can all do so much more together than we ever could on our own.
name: Camp Walter

description: Every camp has a MacGyver -- now the MacGyvers have a union. We provide all MacGyvers with recognition, thanks, tools, training, entertainment, emotional and moral support, chill space away from their home camp, and an official ID card.
name: MacGyvers' Union

description: Our shaded bar/chill space offers welcome respite and comfort for the dusty and thirsty. Home made beer, mead and cocktails on tap. Cribbage, box hockey and more games available. Random events include: haiku for a brew, dark bar, (poon)tang mimosas, robe party, etc.
name: Molotov Cocktail

description: Hippocampus serves you hot and fresh, sexy and helpful.  We invite you to play with us at our mid-day communion through dance at Hippocampus Dance Church and also at our moving café, which appears by magic along with the sun.
hometown: Minneapolis, Seattle, San Francisco Bay Area, International Around the Way
name: Hippocampus

description: A fun bunch of weirdos here to bring joy to anyone ready to receive it. Come doodle and craft, drink and play or just cuddle in our puddle. Maybe even spin our wheel to see what we’ll make you do next!  Adult babies are always at play here so release your inner child and come jump in the fun!
name: Happy Kaos!

description: Come hang out where Trash meets High Class. Superstars explains the mostest fun over the top best of the best where Scotch & Hop is more refined. WTS unites with S&H to create the classiest mess you have ever seen! White Trash brings the dive bar feel serving crappy drinks by the thousands full of games to keep you busy & having a ton of fun for days. Scotch & Hop is more dignified with their scotch bar and school yard games. Riddles block the speakeasy where if you're clever enough, figure it out, you can enjoy top-shelf craft cocktails.  If you are bored here it's time to take a nap. Too long has "hop" been in front of "scotch"! Come and Enjoy some "Scotch" with your hop!
hometown: Reno, New York and New Jersey, Hawaii, Las Vegas, Bismark, Boston, Toronto, London, Prague, Australia
name: White Trash Superstars Scotch&Hop

description: Body Art & Penny Smashing Point is a place where you can take a body art journey with professional artists and have pictures made in their photo booth. You can also make a long lasting gift from the playa by smashing a penny with the Burning Man logo and 2018 date.
name: Body Art & Penny Smashing Point

description: We are the Hash House Harriers of Black Rock City, a drinking group with a running problem with a chapter found in almost every major city in the world. Our camp theme centers around our heritage as hashers. Our goal is to introduce burners to hashing as well as introduce Burning Man and the 10 principles to hashers new to the event.
name: BRC Hash House Harriers (BRCH3)

description:
Creators of the Chilopod biomorphic interactive lighting sculpture, likely in deep playa. 
www.chilopod.life
Team Embrio
name: Chilopod Art Support Camp

description: Fire A'Muser's will delight your senses with dazzling performances of a certain mischievous circus flavor!
name: Fire A Muser's

description: Dazed and hazy? Come to Liminal Labs to enjoy ROBOTOMAT  full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives daytime then come warp your mind by watching two movies at once under the starry night sky. www.liminallabs.com/2018
name: Liminal Labs

description:
A Chill Lounge in the Suburbs
Come relax in the shade and try one of the special "Kiwi" drinks away from the hustle & bustle of the Esplanade
name: Friendzied Serenity

description: Bureau of Erotic Discourse, where learning is fun and consent is sexy.
name: B.E.D Bureau of Erotic Discourse

description: The fastest pizza you'll get, standing there.
name: Fastest Pizza Stand

description: Camp Hope offers coffee, cocktails, and chill space. Join our Self-Commitment Ceremony on Thursday at dusk and commit to treating yourself with loving kindness.
hometown: Brooklyn, San Francisco, Boulder, Fort Collins, Sydney, Paris, Tel Aviv, Hamburg, Berlin
name: Hope

description: Palm Tree Country Club is back to bring class to the playa with a range of activities for the hoightiest and toightiest of club members, including wine and cheese pairings, mini golf, and new for this year, bouncy horse racing. Come take our horses out for a spin and sample wines from our classy country club staff.
name: Palm Tree Country Club

description: Tautology is a collective of mathematician-artists from all around the world who build installations for local, regional, and international festivals.
name: Tautology

description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads -- the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.
hometown: San Francisco, Los Angeles, Boston, NYC
name: The Phage

description: Teddies is a vibey lounge camp with good tunes, great drinks, and a friendly crowd.  Come in for a drink, dance in front of our Bear Head DJ booth, or take a rest in our Teddy dome.
name: Teddies

description: The Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon is the kind of cowboy bar that you would see in a movie made by the bastard love child of Sergio Leone and Frederico Fellini. We whoop. We holler. We lasso each other. And every afternoon we pour the finest handcrafted beer you will find this side of the Quinn River.
name: Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon

description: Coffee was meant to be brewed fresh right before you enjoy it! Join the Cafe de la Fin du Monde on our shaded patio, to start those lazy mornings with a cup of the darkest expression of God's love.
name: Cafe De La Fin du Monde

description: The Most Radiant Camp at Burning Man! Come taste our Hot Fusion pancakes at 9AM and Cold Fission ice cream and Nuclear Winter Brew iced coffee at 3PM. Enjoy the magnificent views of BRC and bounce off the trampoline at the top of our 25' tall Chilling Tower. Or relax in our Reactor Dome to the soothing sound of the Geiger counter.
name: Atom Cult

description: The Janky Barge has been coming back to the Playa for over 10 years! The Janky Barge brings a musical lineup of funk, disco, dance beats you won't hear anywhere else on Playa. You can find us anywhere on the Playa by looking for our Join us for another year of funky tunes, shaking butts, and a bouncing bus.
name: The Janky Barge

description: JAC village is a new village combining 2 art cars with a dynamic theme camp. We will be offering daily happy hour cruises along with art car symposiums every other day where will answer any and all questions regarding an art car build process.
name: JAC Village

description: A rogue robot is like a Tsunami:  our rituals will wash over you and remind you that you are Home: Snow Cones, Beer Bongs, Playa Fashion Makeovers, and Fire!
name: Camp Tsunami

description: Sisyphus Collective Headquarters - come learn about our project and help us find our balls.
name: Sisyphus Collective

description: A Family style house to come hang out, eat, drink,play games be family and encounter one of our interactive rooms. You may come as a stranger but you will leave as family!!
name: Encounter

description: Black Rock City's first "Custom Apology Delivery Service" offers Playa-friendly flowers, Burner-centric cards, and singing "SorryGrams" for BRC residents who wish to make playAmends. Send out a card or two, decorate your own card, relax in our breezy shade structure or have a shot of artisanal, home-infused vodka. Check Playa Events for Sorry Soirees, fiery fetes, vod tastings and daytime workshops
name: Camp PlayApology

description: Pancake Playhouse: Serving fresh pancakes and playing soft rock Monday through Friday, nine-ish to noonish.
name: Pancake Playhouse

description: Destiny Lounge 3D invites you to enjoy our astounding 3D lounge in Space, completely surrounded by amazing 3D UV artwork! Have your mind completely blown by our incredible artistry, get the best sloppy wet Free Blowjobs available on the playa (all ages, genders, and species welcome!), and have your mind completely twisted by a journey thru space in the amazing Vortex of Destiny!
name: Destiny Lounge 3D

description: Camp MOSAIC
name: MOSAIC

description: The Time Colony offers an array of services and support to hungry time-travelers and the time-traveler-curious.
hometown: Seattle, Minneapolis, Las Vegas, San Francisco
name: Time Colony

description: take it easy . . .  but take it.
name: ANOSTRACA

description: We are an international group of pixelated rabbits with a steam sauna. Bring your best bunny self.
name: 8-bit Bunny

description: Ashram Galactica - The Grand Hotel | Your Home Away From Home Away From Home
name: Ashram Galactica

description:
"The world now is too dangerous and beautiful for anything but love."  Religious as Fuck is a place for prayer, blessing, conversation and spiritual healing.  We will offer morning prayer and daily time for conversation, prayer and prayer bead making. We will offer worship services and blessings at the temple.
Open dialogue about what religion, spirituality, and God mean to people, or quite honestly, what they don't mean to them as well.
name: Religious As Fuck

description: In a lost misty moment of time, thousands of feet under the sea, a vast mountain ascended to the sky, through the mud and slag and opalescent water, pierced the surface then lifted its mighty head toward the heavens and became PLANET HULA. There in the belly of our planet, you will discover a deeply-rooted Native Hawaiian experience, where tradition and innovation coexist in surprising and meaningful ways, with children and adult hula classes, lessons in lei-making, ukulele playing and chanting, along with tropical libations and "broke da mouth" local-Hawaiian fare, after which you will sit back and be dazzled by the most kick-ass, authentic, funky, subversive, traditional, surrealicious, guttural and glamorous hula you will ever witness.
name: Planet Hula

description: American by birth; Black Right City Citizen by the grace of the gods! Come see us at Apocalypse WOW, the place to be for all the things you love about America (and don't): hot dogs, Vietnamese iced coffee, and jousting in patriotic spandex. We're here to quash those vibes of impending world doom and give you a chance to prove you're not a Narc while doing a naked handstand. We love you already.
name: Apocalypse Wow

description: HORIZON is a camp of community, celebration, curiosity and creativity, basking in the glow of the sun and a sense of wonder and exploration. Through daily sunset happy hours with music and drinks, daily talks and workshops on an eclectic variety of exciting subjects, aerial performance, and an incredible late night dome video projection show, we invite you to the outer edges of the city to celebrate the beauty of the playa and of one another.
name: HORIZON

description: Express yourself on canvas and paint on the Wall. Supplies are provided for this community art project. All we need is you!
name: Art Wall for All

description: Come escape the heat and climb around the thin net separating the clouds below from the stars above.
name: Burning Questions

description: Inspiration in the dust!  Come check out our course catalog and find a workshop or lecture that will amuse, stimulate, interest, or inspire you.  Learn what the coldest substance on earth is, and experiment with flash-freezing stuff.  Practice your inner comic at our improv workshop.  Come discuss books over wine and cheese.   Attend our "is this your first burn?" workshop and learn how to really connect on the playa.   Then on Saturday receive your dubious degree at our end-of-term graduation party.
name: Black Rock City Community College

description:
We're the scientists who long to be artists.  And the artists with a passion for science.  We can show you how a crystal is born, and then teach you to make wearable art with it.  Want to look at the sun?  Want to look at the sun and NOT go blind? We got you, and we'll even paint you up once you're done.  Greet the dawn with qigong.  Or put the more entertaining parts of your anatomy to work by learning just how dancers make those tassels spin.

Or, just kick back in the shade, trade a bad idea for a bad drink, and relax at the worst bar on the Playa (since 2010!).
name: Academy of Arts and Sciences

description: Need to update your playa look?  Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar has you covered with costumes and a photo studio for lasting memories.
name: Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar

description: Instant Gratification has a simple goal -- to ensure that everyone on the playa can indulge themselves in the moment through serendipitous gratification. Within our camp, we'll host happy hours centered around good music, drinks, and a unique, interactive visualization; we want to foster a sense of enjoyment and playfulness within our camp.
name: Instant Gratification

description: Cold brew / spanking exchange accompanies kinetic artworks.
name: Metric Duck Ton

description: Gypsy Kitties Robo Brain Machina is an immersive  transformational experience  where an  organic life form evolves with the synthetic into android machina.
name: Gypsy Kitties Robo Brain Machina

description: ALI BAR-BAR is a theme camp that provides shelter day and night, drinks, and edgy entertainment for the citizens of Black Rock City with the mission to have fun in a welcoming and comfortable environment to chill, relax, drink, and dance. Our motto is "Top shelf music & bottom shelf drinks!"
name: Ali Bar-Bar

description: La Calaca Village is comprised of three sister theme camps: Piñatas Revenge (founding camp), Camp La Calaca (2013-present) and our newest addition 'Maqinas de Ideas' (2017-present).  La Calaca Village offers both theme camps and artist support on the playa.   We pride ourselves on being makers and healers.  -- Come for the healing, stay for the hedonism -- We love our community in the 3:00 sector, and our interactivity is aimed at making new friends each year in our neighborhood and throughout the playa.  Experience the ultimate relaxation of the 'Safety Net' or the extravagant, weightless jumps on the 'Safety Swing'.  Spiritual healers, yogis and massage artists await you in our Healing Plaza.  Come see the "Mini-playa" exhibit featuring a giant, Burning Woman! seek us out at 3:00 and the end!
name: La Calaca Village

description:
Coyote Garden is a camp where we celebrate the native song dog of the Americas, as well as the many other coyotes of the universe.  Our primary mission is to increase coyote consciousness by nourishing the ever-present coyote ethos that permeates the burner community…and to support our ancient trickster god Coyote's perpetually-meandering plans for intergalactic domination!

The camp is built around an interactive , all-ages, kinetic UV art installation that incorporates dozens of UV-reactive art pieces, which were collaboratively created by over 30 artists from around the world.
name: Coyote Garden

description: An electrical tasting bar: We zap you with a shock, you get a shot!
name: Shots for Shocks!

description:
Hosting a perpetual Cuban-themed sultry Havana Nights party, with a
laid-back Miami feel.  Palm trees will surround the perimeter of a large
shaded, dance floor; comfortable, elevated chill pads available for guest to
relax. Rhythmic Cuban and energetic Latin beats will play in the background.
Bottomless, hand-muddled frozen mojitos served by camp attendants wearing
guayabera shirts. Dance lessons daily.
name: HAVANA NIGHTS

description:
Elvis Wedding Chapel & Animatronic Gardens
"Happily ever after" begins here! Now in our eighth year of hosting ersatz Playa weddings for the nuptially needy, EWC welcomes individuals, couples, trios and other configurations without regard to race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, species or any other limiting factor. The Moist Rev. L. Ron Presley, assisted by the Good Rev. Bubba Ho-Tep, officiates over a variety of custom-tailored ceremonies, each climaxed by the dramatic revelation of the spirit of Lord Elvis—as embodied by the amazing, life-size, audio-anatomically accurate ELBOT 2000, Black Rock City's most venerable robotic resident! But first, our fabulous fashion experts outfit the bride, groom and attendants in dazzling Playa finery in our legendary Bridezilla Lounge!
name: Elvis Wedding Chapel & Gardens

description: The hangout for translegal alien beatniks, mutant cyborg gear heads, trans-solar scooter gangs, radical anarchist raypunks, surreal retrofuturists, wigged-out weirdos, and certified caffeine fiends of every stripe. Our Mission: To serve delicious coffee (fresh ground dark roast French press brewed black as the depths of interstellar space itself) in a cool space (outlaw poetry outsider art wild tunes crazy talk) with gracious hospitality.
hometown: Like, we're not from around here, dig?
name: ASTRO SHACK JaVa JoINt

description: Inspiration Point provides a shaded and comfortable communal space where BRC citizens can relax under a mister, enjoy fruit smoothies, practice yoga, participate in moderated discussions and enjoy beautiful music.
name: Inspiration Point

description: HTML, C++, ASL, Body Language, Music, Art, Singing, Dancing are all ways we use to connect. Come to Connect Moar and plug in!
name: Connect MOAR!

description: Stop by the  Camp SPF Sunscreen station. Ask for help or put it on yourself!
name: Camp SPF

description: If Violence is not the Answer, Maybe you've got the wrong Question. Black Rock Cities' Best and Probably Only Place to train Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Muay Thai and Engage in Ritualized Violence!  We also offers non-violent classes too such as yoga, mediation, and mobility to help you Settle This Like REAL Men.
name: Settle This Like Men

description: Feeling rambunctious and want to take a whirl on the tire swing? Or just thirsty and in need of shade and entertainment? We've got it all. Stop by Mon-Fri from 3pm-5pm for the happiest of happy hours to check out all the action the Whisker Biscuit has to offer. Can't make happy hour? No problem. Stop by anytime, there's sure to be someone awesome here. You might get snark…you might get a hot dog…the sky's the limit. But we'd love to see you all!
name: Whisker Biscuit

description: Pink Mammoth is a house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We strive to create an environment of love and compassion, selflessness and support, health and vitality, that encourages everyone we encounter to shine and thrive.
name: Pink Mammoth

description:
Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the divine feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart your radiance your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome.

At Naked Heart we recognize the need to embrace both the light and the dark in our journeys. When we pursue the light we use movement, the senses, sensuality, sexuality and connection.  This beckons us in and brings the light of awareness back into the bodies we have vacated. We are particularly interested in the seat of power and intention housed in our bodies. To go there fully requires confronting our shadows. We embrace those as well as we dive into shame, fear, anger, unsavory memories from this life and past lives, and disempowering images of our bodies. Welcome home.
name: Naked Heart

description: Come to Presence Camp and delight in the joy of the now.  We have a meditation station open 24/7.
name: Presence Camp

description: The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit to uncover the highest version of themselves - to realize their own inner god or goddess.
name: Olympus

description: Join the Baconeers once again for good music and parties! Join us for shade and friendly fun on any day, but definitely stop by Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday for afternoon parties. Resident DJ Exodus and special guests will play classic 90's hip-hop, funk, break-beats and misc. other fun stuff! Come get a cup, a drink, and maybe some bacon! And if you're passing by in the morning, stop by for a cup of coffee and relax on the couches in the shade!
name: Baconeers

description:
Camp Anything Can Be Fixed.  
From broken shoe laces, flat tires, and dead batteries to broken hearts - anything can be fixed.  We begin with radical acceptance.  Every experience is an opportunity to learn and to grow.  We are active, productive; we practice and teach radical self-reliance - unabashed, unrepentant adaptability and make-do.  Sometimes, you need an inner tube patch, a battery, an LED, a needle and thread, a drink, a snack, or a shady spot to rest.  Camp Anything Can Be Fixed is your Playa General Store, gifting all the bits and pieces you need to keep your burn going strong.
Obstacles are just things to be overcome, after all.  Darling, we care about your suffering.  Please relax, take respite, have some nuts and juice.  Everything is going to be alright.  It is getting better all the time.
name: Camp Anything Can Be Fixed

description: Habitat for Insanity embraces the creation of novel burner technology and events. We're a do-ocracy, meaning that although we do not assign tasks, we manage to accomplish a lot!
name: Habitat for Insanity

description: Iceberg Cowboys - Wranglin' Icebergs and Ridin' em off into the sunset
hometown: Oakland, Tampa, Johannesburg, New York, Tel Aviv
name: Iceberg Cowboys

description: Preservation Society: Come find what has been lost in the dust. Our events refresh you with movement and dance, challenge your frame of mind with talks on topics far and wide, and satiate your hunger with delicious roasts.
name: Preservation Society

description: We guide you to find your KEY! We have camp members from Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia and of course the United States! We will help you to find your key so please come and visit us!
name: The Key Camp

description: Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. Come join us for karaoke and play on our interactive musical art project!
name: Deep C

description: No gurus here! This art support camp houses "This too shall pass- Moondancer", part of the art honoraria this year, when it's not flying around playa. It also houses strong women and men who will be happy to make you coffee, stamp you with our unique tough titties art and sit down and chat endlessly about life, the universe and titties.
name: Tough Titties

description: Lux Vag is where sandy bodies come to get fancy! Visit our temporary tattoo and bedazzling parlor Tuesday-Thursday afternoons.
name: Luxurious Vagrants

description: Who doesn't love Christmas? We certainly do and we want to share our joyful Christmas Spirit with our fellow campers and we hope that a visit to our camp will help to remind others of the joy and pleasure of giving to others. The camp will have a 25 foot decorated tree as its focal point and Santa will be available for photos.
name: The Santa Man Cometh.....

description: Art Support camp for an immersive, puzzle and riddle locked Speakeasy full of art inventions in the deep open Playa.
name: Black Rock Blind Tiger

description:
We are a department within the Department of Public Works that builds 1,000 bicycles every year and deploys them for free use around Black Rock City. Get on our bikes and ride!
Our crew also manages bicycle lost & found, and abandoned bike clean up efforts on playa post-event.
hometown: NA (but most of us are from Austin)
name: Community Yellow Bike Shop

description:
The Dust Monkeys' revolutionary Fauxtobooth is guaranteed to make you smile and will always capture your good side. Don your best duds and come on down to experience the mystical power of fauxtography first hand!

We'll also be hosting sound baths, yoga classes, partner stretching sessions, and serving gyoza on Thursday. Don't forget to check out the book for days and times!
name: Dust Monkeys

description: Red Nose District History, background: Red Nose District (RND) has been in existence, in one form or another, since 1998. In 2013, we resolved to keep our hearts, minds, and noses RED from now until the end of time! RND has roots and participants in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Santa Fe, Oregon, Canada, Israel, France, and various states and countries around the world. Our members are involved in (or are lovers of) the circus arts, and work to bring our various skills and talents to the playa in forms that allow for an immersive, participatory experience for the citizens of Black Rock City. Notable past projects/activities include: High Chair Stilt Bar, Pedalbump, Muse, Fire Wire, Wheel of Fortune, Zenobia Blanca stilt limo, Zeppelin art cars, afternoon stilt lessons, the Stoop, Whiskey Kickball, and circus variety shows of all forms!  Want to know more?  Come find us on the playa!
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco, Santa Fe, Bend/Portland, Denver
name: Red Nose District

description: Learning, sharing and exploration stemming from solution-oriented, positive thinking and an unguided, free social environment. Even giants feel small when they gaze at the stars...
name: Giants Workshop

description: Consider yourself wrangled. Join Sacred Cow every evening for horchata, shade, and tequila and look for our Moroccan theme beast floating on playa. Enjoy the views from our bus roof while we bath you in drinks, fruit, bacon, and beats.
name: Sacred Cow Glory Hole in The Wall

description:
Like the Legend of the Phoenix, Draft Punk returns to supply ice-cold beer to the denizens Black Rock City.
Bring us your hot, your tired, and your thirsty.
Grab a cold one on the go, or hang out for the day.
Get there early for Baby Huey's famous cocktails.
SEE the world's biggest pool table.
Mention this ad and get 50% off!
name: Draft Punk at the Trash Fence

description: Node Republik celebrates the FUTURE in an optimistic, loving and expressive way. We host music, dance, meditation, sound healing and talks about what the future holds, abundance and empowerment to create our own destinies.
name: Node Republik

description:
EXPERIENCE RADICAL METAMORPHOSIS ON A JOURNEY THROUGH THE SEVEN STAGES OF ALCHEMY, IN SYNERGY WITH THE   SEVEN DAYS OF BURNING MAN.
Throughout history alchemy has been recognized as the process of transformation. This year at Burning Man we embark on our own journey as a community called PlayAlchemist.
name: PlayAlchemist

description: Home of Playa Speed Dating, and lore 30,000 years old.
name: Clevian Circularity

description: We started out as 17 fresh-faced Burner-virgins, and one dusty vet - all with a shared philosophy: that we treat our friends as family, and that we're always open to new friends. And oh my, has our family has grown! So come by for a rip down the portal, we'll pour you a cocktail in the jungle, and let's get acquainted.
name: 17 Virgins

description: A Huevo? A Huevo! Come and relax at our chill bar and enjoy handcrafted drinks crafted especially for you. Specials change every day - from hot toddies in the morning to get you going to white drinks on Wednesday and signature bull drinks everyday. Open Mon-Fri 12pm to 8pm.
name: A Huevo? A Huevo!

description:
IDEATE is a space for ideas, innovation, collaboration, and designing new paradigms to address the biggest challenges we face on spaceship earth - and bringing them to the world.  

We have something to delight and inspire everyone. We embody the Burning Man Principles and we live by the axiom, "Be the change you want to see in the world."
name: IDEATE

description: STRANGELOVE! Come enjoy a pleasant layover at our Jet-Age lounge - sip a tasty beverage of your choice while our DJs pilot you to a variety of lovely destinations. Fly the Friendly!
name: STRANGELOVE

description: Chop Shop is the Best Playa Repair garage in BRC! We are ready to repair a wide variety of Playa transportation with parts, repairs and advice.
name: Chop Shop

description: Cold alcohol Tiki Punch is served, for those age 21 and over (ID required), starting at 11:00am daily. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Stop in and have a seat where you are bound to meet someone new. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get "leid". Come party with us for our 9th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly.
name: Party Naked Tiki Bar

description: The Black Rock Wine Cellar returns once again to provide delectable dabblings from our unique wines made from Deep Playa Vineyards. Join us for daily tastings and discussion, and look for us in our secret pop-up locations!
name: Black Rock Wine Cellar

description: Don't call it a comeback, we been here for YEARS! Burntown offers a smorgasbord of FUN. We have the SNUFF Emporium dispensing fine nasal snuffs. All day, some late nights...come find out what tobacco and other non-tobacco snuff can do for your burn! Take a trip across our Rope Bridge of Death, only the strong will survive! We have a Corner Store that is not to be missed... stocked daily for those special needs only on the playa. We welcome any and ALL brave enough to enter our camp.
name: Burntown

description:
From Deep within the Valhalla mountains of BC Canada

MythMaker merges the ancient arts of storytelling & theatre with the dramatic skills of the circus arts creating a
multidisciplinary art experience, delving into the mystical, magical and profound. Performances include theatre, music, dance and ceremonies, including the dynamic circus arts of fire spinning, acrobatics, aerials and stilt walking.
Their multi-dimensional performances strive to
integrate a new cultural mythology through ritualistic performance art inspiring a new dream, which empowers the individual and community to co-create a sustainable future for all life.
name: MythMaker Camp

description: Go from analogue to digital at SECRET PASSAGE AUDIO BAR. Bathe in sounds, listen to tales of robots, and dance with spacecats.  You may enter as a hellacious hippie, but you'll leave as a radical robot!
name: Secret Passage

description:
PickleBack Mountain has the world famous home-made PickleBacks! And the Great Bucking Pickle! 
Come by and ride our pickle and enjoy a PickleBack!
name: PickleBack Mountain

description: Brand-ur-Ass N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin' post and get a temporary brand. Bathe in gong vibrations, do some cock ropin', enjoy tunes, belly up to the saloon, enjoy the giving tree, play some carnival games and hitch a ride on our vehicles. Y'all come N play!
name: Brand-ur-Ass N More

description: Welcome to the Great White North! We've brought a taste of the Arctic to the playa. Come chill in our air-conditioned igloo, escape the daytime heat, enjoy a frosty cocktail and bust a move.
name: Polar Bar

description:
You, me, 2 others, some paddles and balls.

That's pickleball.
name: In a pickle

description: Come join the fun at Candyland and have a treat dispensed from antique and homemade candy machines.  Candinistas show you how everyday from 10 am until 6 pm.
name: Candyland

description: We are an group of givers and doers that offer thousands of pounds of organic fruits and vegetables to the people of Black Rock daily in a small, intimate setting on the far reaches of the playa.
name: WMICC -Organic Fruit & Veggie Bar

description: ROBOTS AND HUMANS all are welcome to craft a brass Amulet- recording your experience, your mark, or a symbol that represents your burn.  Our Amulet counselors will guide you in creating a personal token on a brass dog tag with metal stamped words, numbers & symbols.
hometown: Castro Valley, Pebble Beach, NY, Chicago, Santa Cruz, Oakland, Alameda & SF
name: Amulet

description: Come to Nacho Campo for Luchadors, Ceremony and Fiesta. Experience the art of culture, tradition, spirituality and pleasure in our wrestling ring, you could be the next champion or a pantsless referee.
name: Nacho Campo

description: Playground is an oasis for the intrepid burner crossing the vast expanse of BRC.  Filled with sights, sounds and music, Playground will entrance and delight with fun, fire and dance.
name: Playground

description: Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens, providing shade and drink noon-5 Mon-Fri to celebrate and beat the heat in the bar in a large, cool desert tent from India; or at night sit by the fire or Engage with the Cosmic Theatre Chronosphere Robotica; or day or night play full court basketball with glow-in-the-dark balls and cheerleading gear or give and receive gifts at the gifting tree.
name: Ganesh Camp

description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill within the waves with some liquid joy.
name: Darwin Fish Tank

description: Armageddon - it's not the end of the world, it's the Safe Word! We offer professional bike repair daily, providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years.
name: Armageddon Camp

description: Tropical Happy Hour: Slushy pina coladas, space helmets, spam musubi, and tropical house. Hawaiian shirt attire encouraged; shirts provided for those who need it.
name: Tropical Lunartics

description: Entheos draws together shamans, scientists, artists, builders, instructors and activists from around the globe who are exploring the healing benefits, and consciousness raising capacity, of the natural entheogenic medicines traditionally used throughout world history. Entheos points to the creative, collaborative spark within each of us, and the divine fire we can ignite when we gather to play and learn together.
name: Entheos

description:
CMGC - Camp Make Good Choices
Come by the Mos Eisley village and meet us and our cohort!
Fun, games, and inclusive events for ALL!
name: CMGC - Camp Make Good Choices

description: Golden Cafe is your home on the playa for exotic cocktails, home infused liquors, and live music since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, and sample strange infusions from our cellars.
name: Golden Cafe

description: Satisfy your hunger with the best late night grilled cheese sandwich goodness served directly to your mouth.
name: Moon Cheese

description: Milk + Honey is excited to offer our tenth Playa Shabbat service and dinner which draw on secular and spiritual traditions for the creative expression and collective healing of individuals and communities. We nourish the hearts, spirits, and bodies of all who find themselves wandering in the desert!
name: Milk & Honey

description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come, volunteer and participate in our daily talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!
name: Earth Guardians

description: Visit the Institute of Higher Yearning where our overeducated undermanaged staff will jam in your brain all the science, electro-shock therapy and swordplay that you can take. God created the playa to train the faithful and we will teach you EVERYTHING you need to know.
name: The Institute Village

description: THE BELLIGERENT GAP is a Western-themed, homebrew camp dispensing cold beer daily (from high noon to whenever we want), served up by the most lovable assholes this side of the 6 o'clock suburbs.
name: BELLIGERENT GAP

description: Tea & Turbans provides a space to cool down and relax in the midday heat through a tea ceremony similar to what has been done in the Magreb (North Africa) by the Amazighs (Berbers) for centuries.
name: Tea & Turbans

description: Lost in the jungle you'll never know what creature you might discover. Come discover your spirit animal and walk on the wild side!
name: Jungle Oddity

description: Sharing inclusive and shining vibes since 2012! Lovers of trolls, pineapples, and bike gangs.
name: French Manila

description: Brain Freeze / Got stickers camp will again be serving up frozen margaritas and stickers. Along with our various forms of entertainment, no one will get bored.
name: Brain Freeze / Got Stickers Camp

description: Shady Waffle is a full-service breakfast restaurant in a brilliantly colored one-of-a-kind forty foot tall elliptical dome. A machine that converts cranky hippies into happy hippies. Come eat, cool off, relax, and make a stranger even stranger.
name: Shady Waffle

description: Reared In Steel's Camp Fire Ball.  Come shoot some balls of fire from the Flower Tower!
name: Reared In Steel's Camp Fire Ball

description:
""You know that place between sleep and awake, that place where you still remember dreaming? That's where I'll always love you, Peter Pan. That's where I'll be waiting."

Never Never Camp is a radically inclusive, radically irreverent, and joyously unabashed group of misfits and discards who just wanted a place to fit in. A place they can call home. A place where for once in their goddamn lives feel like they didn't miss the party.
name: Never Never Camp

description: CELTIC CHAOS is so unpredictable as to appear random, owing to great sensitivity to small changes in conditions and creations of the universe.   Come join the CHAOS and dance your socks off!!
name: Celtic Chaos

description:
Participants are invited (or dared) to enter through our apocalyptic transportation tunnel where they will be treated to video screens, audio loops, artifacts relaying the downfall of mankind, and the start of something new. Once through the tunnel, guests enter a swanky, otherworldly Piano Lounge and speakeasy.

The lounge features a Robotic Piano that will play any song requested. Come take a turn at the ivories themselves, or test your luck at the Burner Friendly casino tables:  (s)Craps, Poker, and Roulette. The games mimic their real world counterparts with an emphasis on gifting and a few unusual additions.
name: Mystikal Misfits

description: "What? I've always been a Space Ninja!!" says anyone who meanders into our relaxing shade tent, sits awhile and pontificates upon the minimalism and agility with which one can relax. Yes, yes, we are indeed quite adept at sitting back and doing less. We can be so good at relaxing, we're basically ninjas at it. Come enjoy some chill-out music, rest from the sun during the day, and enjoy fire puffers and burn barrels at night. Experience one of the signature sensations of being on playa: the warm puff of a sudden fireball above you, the energetic glow dissipating into space but remaining in your memory forever.
name: Space Ninjas

description: This may or may not be our camp. We may or may not be able to help you. We may or may not look forward to seeing you. There may or may not be snacks (probably not).
name: Camp of Indecision

description: Brulee is your kinky Esplanade camp with 24/7 interactivity, including Bacon Communion and nightly play parties
name: Brulee

description: Anahasana Village brings awareness to a fully embodied knowing of the power and the wisdom of our own hearts.  Through movement practices, emotional sharing, dance, yoga, meditation, breathwork and more, we aim to allow for freedom and honesty to be a part of all of our relationships.
name: Anahasana Village

description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the plays with the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas while you relax in the shade.
hometown: San Francisco, Boston, DC, Boulder, Costa Rica
name: Bumblepuss

description: DeMaTerial once again returns to the playa—our international diaspora of American, Australian, Kiwi, and other burners from across the globe welcomes you to our fantastic dome. Featuring a Bloody Mary bar in the morning, hot, savory, sometimes truffled fries at random times, Licensing Bureau during the day, and the homiest Christmas on the playa (enquire within).
name: DeMaTerial

description: 'Sundowners' is a wonderful South African drinks ceremony honoring life, art and friendship at sunset. Join our community and celebrate the special transition from day to night with safari inspired beverages, music and performances before your night of adventures. During light hours, our Safari Day Spa will soothe your body and lift your spirits with personalized healing, an oxygen bath and rejuvenating refreshments.
name: Sundowners

description: Wickedland is a place for you to get in touch with your wicked, creative side. During the day you are welcome to use our photo booth, join one of the art workshops, or just relax in our communal tent with a beverage of your choice. In the evenings we'll have our interactive music machine running which will help you create an original sound track even if you don't have any music background.
name: WickedLand

description: Burners Without Borders (BWB) camp is home to participants involved in disaster relief, social impact, civic activation and engagement projects around the world.  We host talks, workshops, a maker space and a nightly fire to bring together our community and create new friendships.
name: Burners Without Borders (BWB)

description: At Appropriated Dragon Dim Sum, we borrow a little from the East and a little from the West to bring you an immersive experience where the greatest gift is sharing.
name: Appropriated Dragon Dim Sum

description: Soul Mate (sōl mah-tay) invites friends new and old to join us for funky mate tea cocktails delicious vintage soul music. Revitalize your soul with mate, music, and friendship.
name: Soul Mate

description: The aCATemy, Burning Man's most prestigious cat university, engages students in art, science and philosophy through classes, readings, and fun, cat- and robot-themed making and learning! Come learn strategies for survival under our robot/animal overlords in our decked out cybernetic forest.
name: The aCATemy

description:
Ice Cubed is the ice sales igloo located on the 3 o'clock side of the
city.  This year it is located a few streets back from where you
normally find it.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per
bag/block or $18 for a 6-pack of crushed ice.  Ice Cubed sales hours
are Mon-Sat 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm
name: Arctica Ice Sales- Ice Cubed
