description: Come cat around at Haüs Catz! Stick around for our house music, events, stories and see why we are such a close camp year round. After you've been christened with a cat collar, grab a nipple button and recite the three rules. Sunset Naked Happy Howls, questionable Yoga & decisions, in general - we've got it all! Keep your hands and arms inside the vehicle, but don't forget to maintain thigh contact!
name: Haüs Catz

description: "More bunny than bunny is our motto" -Dr. Psycho, Blade Hopper
name: Bunny Meth Lab

description: Cool butt, you Sleazy Beach
name: Sleazy Beaches

description: Salt is one of the most important building blocks of life and one of the most important elements playa-goers need to sustain a healthy Burn. Salt House provides the playa with salts of all kinds: homemade salty snacks and drinks, sweaty (salty!) yoga classes, and mind-expanding conversations that conjure the good kind of salty tears.
name: Salt House

description:
Ice 9 is the ice sales igloo located on the 9 o'clock side of the
city.  This year it is located a few streets back from where you
normally find it.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per
bag/block or $18 for a 6-pack of crushed ice.  Ice 9 sales hours
are Pre-Event Saturday and Sunday, Noon-6pm, Event Week: Mon-Sat 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm.
name: Arctica Ice Sales - Ice 9

description: UFO - home of Ur a Fabulous Organism spa day!
name: U.F.O.

description: First burn, or maybe just an especially rough one? Mom and Dad want you to have a great burn, so we're here for hugs, advice, a healthy snack, or maybe just some tough love.
name: Camp Mom and Dad

description: Booty Kitchen is a place to honor and worship the two most important things in life: food, and booty. We are a group of individuals filled with passion for celebrating the magic that food has to bring people together. We support body positivity and encourage others to celebrate the gifts they are given (both physical and non-physical), as well as the ASSets they recognize in others (in a manner that is safe and comfortable for both parties).
name: Booty Kitchen

description: Disco Fuck Yourself is a camp dedicated to Music, Dance, Self Love, and Self Deconstruction. We will be holding events along this theme including dance parties, fire spin jams, singalongs, and group meditations.
name: Disco Fuck Yourself

description: More Carrot: Sure, you could live off protein bars and MREs all week if you really want to, but how about giving your dusty soul a treat? Come by the More Carrot Camp and get yourself something crunchy, cold and crisp; we gift fresh vegetables and fruit at the More Carrot Camp. Tues. - Fri., 8 - 10 a.m.
name: More Carrot Camp

description: The Post Nuclear Family virtual home ~ mutants are welcome!
name: Post Nuclear Family

description:
The Breakfast Club Village Houses,
Scarbutts Coffee-serving hot& cold coffee with brisk Spankings 9am-12noon
Pancake Playhouse- serving hot pancakes 9am-12noon
Pajama Burn-making the least of your burn
Identification Corp- Identifying Robots and Humanoids throughout the universe
name: The Breakfast club Village

description: Cosmic Casbah celebrates diversity and provides to all citizens of Black Rock City. Come visit our magical shade lounge, enjoy our libations, robotics, photo booth, music, and games.
name: Cosmic Casbah

description: Journey to a galactic journey, in a faraway universe...
name: Galactic Jungle

description: Are pheromones the secret to lasting love and connection? Or, do you just want an excuse to smell a stranger's armpit? Not Sure? Just Bring a Pheromone!
name: Bring a Pheromone

description: Are you corny all the time?  Guess what?  So are we!  Come to Cornstars.  Have a drink at the Silo Bar.  Stuff your cornhole.  Make your own "corn shoot" or "corn film."  Show us your cob, your silk, or whatever kernels you have hiding in your husks!  We're looking for the next Cornstar, and we're set up to feed your corn addiction!  Get corny with us!
name: Cornstars

description: We're a hodgepodge group of freaks, geeks, and cool cats, bonded together by our love for hot sauce and LAZERS!
name: Camp Lazer Brigade

description: Come grab a book at the dustiest library in the world! Serving Black Rock City since 2013. Strict one-year checkout period will apply.
name: Black Rock Public Library

description: Captain Pump's Raiders is Black Rock City's finest giant-robot driving mercenary company, and we roll a mean D20. Come visit us for RaiderCon V, the Playa's premier (and possibly only) roleplaying-game convention!
name: Captain Pump's Raiders

description: Welcome to ¡Playasos!, a light-hearted and inclusive community with a love for play, spontaneity, and exploration. Come experience our giant snail slide, fun for all ages!
name: ¡Playasos!

description: Hanging Gardens is  an all-inclusive space - male, female, gay and straight - that celebrates the beauty of our interconnectedness, serendipity and of their intersection. Visiting The Hanging Gardens means opening yourself up to the possibilities of chance meetings and unexpected adventures.
name: Hanging Gardens of BRC

description: Come get your funky fresh house groove on and experience mobile art car sound music magic.
name: Bumpbed

description: The Parasol Mafia is dedicated to helping you energize and sustain your body, heart, and mind. Enjoy our shaded self care station with essentials like sunscreen, earplugs, chilled flavored water, electrolyte drinks, and other sustenance; groove with us at our reggae/ska happy hours; revitalize yourself in our parasol dome with guided workshops; get funky at our night time dance parties; Love yourself, it's an offer you can't refuse.
name: Parasol Mafia

description: Welcome to Shine Town. Come help us celebrate our 3rd year on playa with awesome moonshine, awesome humans, and awesome experiences.
name: Shine Town

description: Camp Anita Cocktail: Hailing from 16+ countries around the globe, we contain traces of Australians, Kiwis, Chileans, Saudis, Turks, Nuyoricans, LA-LA Landers, New Yorkers, and other nutty products from afar. Serious reactions may occur. Activities abound all week in our chill space, craft cocktail bar, tea house, spiritual center and cuddle puddle tower. Our cups runneth over with welcome. Let's get down and boogie together!
hometown: 10 Different Countries. US: Denver, NYC, LA, Portland, Bloomington Puerto Rico, New Jersey, Texas, San Fran and more!
name: Anita Cocktail

description:
Camp Delicioso & Creperie was born 9 burns ago when founding members, Jethro and Zesther, who met for the first time in Black Rock City as virgin campers in 2005, decided to create a camp with their international community of friends, family and foodies from around the globe.

What you'll taste and see are yummy creations of love from a colorful menagerie of Deliciosans cooking and serving hundreds of crepes for campers from every delicious sector on the Playa! 

We genuinely love people and strive to provide a warm, colorful and inviting environment for our visitors—from our beautiful bistro tables to our colorfully decorated dome to our bar and giant lampshade and stage, we strive to create a beautiful oasis in the desert.
name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie

description: The spaceport of love on the playa.  Home base of Out Of Band III.
name: Galactic Relay

description:
Machine Yearning: Why is humans?

Our goal to foster a dialogue about the interface between humans, machines, and the decisions that they make. Members of the camp embody our Deep Yearning algorithm, a parafictional state-of-the-art smart assistant that creates personalized experiences for our visitors.
name: Machine Yearning

description:
Come and have tea with us!  
Learn Gong Fu cha style tea ceremonies while chilling to tunes and misters.
www.templeofunitea.com
If you want to come and perform a tea ceremony with us let us know!  We take in tea refugees from all over the world.
name: Temple of Unitea

description: GlamCocks is a global family that was started at Burning Man and is dedicated to creating experiences that bring people together to find inspiration, explore their creativity, and express their fabulous, authentic selves. We believe that creativity, authenticity, and love for yourself and others are critical to having meaningful connections that make life fulfilling.
name: GLAMCOCKS

description: A camp founded on the principles of radical self-reliance and coordinating group costumes, AwesomeTown once again expects to win Burning Man with Breakfast of Champions, a daily cereal offering served up by cereal mascots in a real 50s-inspired kitchen, just like mom used to make!
name: AwesomeTown

description: fearless felines, feeling frantic? feel free to fervently flutter up our fantastically fanciful yet firm fabrication. (please climb on our dome!). comatose cats, come crawl climb or clamber into cool and comfortable cushioned cradles for a cathartic catnap. (we have hammocks, sleep in them).
name: *cats

description: The art support camp for the crew who build and run the fire sculpture   Camera Lucida. Sculpture is on open Playa.
name: Camera Lucida Camp

description: A fun loving bar with a different theme everyday and delicious drinks to help cool you down.
name: Theme Camp Theme Camp

description: To the weary and the dreary, we provide an oasis - a place of refuge - that will recharge your batteries, fill your soul with love and leave you calling out "YES PLEASE!"  To the frisky, the floozy, or otherwise freaky, we supply a fertile fellowship of sexual misfits that celebrate all types of consensual carnal connections. To anyone else needing a friend, a word of advice, or maybe just a place to dance the night away, we're here for you too. Come chill in our revitalizing sanctuary, experience our inclusive oasis of sex-positivity, queer empowerment and love. Yes Please is the answer to every question!
name: Yes Please

description:
Golden Buddha is a 12th Century Silk Road theme camp focused on consciousness, wellness, and love. There are four main features:
Golden Buddha Tea House: sharing essential oil blends, meditation bracelets and a daily tea ceremony.
Yoga, Meditation: daily guided meditation and yoga practice in the mornings and additional sunset events for playa wellness. 
Speaker Series: we've recruited amazing speakers on subjects such as meditation, love and relationships, and mental and physical health.
Smile High Art Car: an airplane-shaped art car graces our visitors with a full sensory experience. Come enjoy the lights, sounds and energy; leave feeling more enlightened and alive!
name: Golden Buddha

description: The Black Rock Brewery offers daily afternoon tastings that include about 15 different home brews. Cold brewed coffee,hot coffee and tea will be served in the morning hours.
name: Black Rock Brewey

description: Camp Reno Nation, the biggest little dive bar on playa.  The best beer, great music... somewhat OK people.
name: Camp Reno Nation

description:
Camp B.Ÿ.T.E This.   

Art support camp.  Find us on the playa or at our camp.  We want to see all of you.
name: Camp Byte This

description: Come chill and get your bearings at PlayaBears Present: BearBots! Where we're always bruin' up a good times and kodiak moments. Our forebears believed in dancing, strong drinks, vegan tacos, and koality time with friends. We're serving up all of the above in our Playa Bear Den! Do you need a place to get away from the pandemonium of the playa? Fur the love of the man, honey! Come join us for our soothing sound healing and aromatherapy session to paws and reflect on your time at the bearn.
name: Playa Bears Present: Bear Bots!

description: Retrofrolic, beating in the heart of the 7:30 corridor, is a radically inclusive, sex-positive destination camp for burners practicing safe, sane, and consensual activities in adult sexual relationships -- and those who want to!  We offer educational classes and workshops, social events, mentorship, skills and technique training, and a fully equipped, 1800 sq. ft. adult playspace for all to enjoy.
name: Retrofrolic

description: Your Local Gallery of Visionary Art and Events
name: Gallery BRC

description: The Petting Zoo is a day bar where you can sit and chat and enjoy a refreshing libation.
name: The Petting Zoo

description: Groove Oasis is your refuge in the dusty desert to rest or move your body. We are hosting dance workshops and parties throughout the week so check the playa schedule and come get your groove on!
name: Groove Oasis

description: Wasabi Kisses aim to provide a safer space for queer and trans burners and their allies. We provide group workshops around the intersections of sexuality, gender expression, and consent, as well as social events, mixers, and dance parties.
name: Wasabi Kisses

description: We provide funky, freaky and fabulous fashions to the citizens of Black Rock City. The boutique is open 12pm-4pm daily. Let our fashionistas slip you into something a little more questionable. Get involved in volunteer as an honorary boutiquer.
name: Black Rock Boutique

description: Our 'Shady Lovers Lounge' is a lush and cushy retreat for all dusty lovers out there! For all you young and young at heart we invite you to browse our BOOTique - open daily until the goods run out! Come mend those broken soles at BRC Shoe Repair and enjoy our in-house DJ's spin sets. If your a morningish person try our Lazy Morning Yoga and meet a fellow Tacoman or just snag a little love, we've got plenty to go around.
name: Tacoma is for Lovers

description: Furniture Car Rally Camp is a welcoming place for all Furniture Car Enthusiasts and Mobile Sofa Owners and Operators at Burning Man
name: Furniture Car Rally Camp

description: The BAAAHS Station village is the framework for several queer burning man theme camps (and mutant vehicles!) to offer a nexus of activity to help facilitate queer art and participation on Playa. Our mission is to get queers out of the 'gay ghetto' and to drag any and all Black Rock City denizens into the our hood to mix things up.
name: BAAAHS Station

description: My Reply Is Yes celebrates organic human intelligence and honors our millenia-long search for advice, guidance and wisdom.  Rather than using artificial intelligence to dictate our interests and suggest our next move, My Reply Is Yes allows burners to reveal their own desires, and set their itinerary for the next 7 days or 7 minutes.  We do this with an oversized Ouija Board, a giant Magic 8-Ball, a wise Zoltar booth ready to grant any wish, and a burner-centric Tarot Card reading station.  All your questions will be answered, and it may be you providing the answers!
name: My Reply Is Yes

description: A ridiculously organized, fruit-loving, consent-driven, sex-positive, patch of melons from around the world, who can't wait to get playful with you!
name: Planned Melonhood

description: Serving coffee, smiles, and good ol' fashion kinky fun since 2014
name: Seattle's Breast Cafe

description: Come visit the Martyville Neighborhood Café and enjoy a beverage of our choice to help you take on the day.  We serve coffee in the morning and rosé in the afternoons -- all to the smooth sounds of '70s easy listening and 80's yacht rock.  This is our truest form of radical self-expression.
name: Martyville

description:
We are Camp Science Camp. If you love science we'd love to meet you! 

If you ever mixed all the colors of paint thinking they would turn out super cool, we want to be your friends. Come by our camp to learn an alternate color scheme where all the colors add up to white instead of brown. Play with our hands on example of the difference between additive and subtractive color schemes! Dance in the light and maybe have a bit of fun while you're here.
name: Camp Science Camp

description: DISTRIKT - Bringing art & beats together - A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ's, original art, and luscious blended libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dance, debaucherous and disorderly, DISTRIKT. You, our guests, are also our performers so BRING IT!
name: DISTRIKT

description: Art Haus brings classical music and dance to the playa! Come experience classical music in a whole new way!
name: Art Haus

description: Clusterf*ck United exists to celebrate all that Burning Man has to offer while providing a safe, supportive and friendly home on the Playa. Honoring our differences while embracing our similarities, welcoming newbies and those with experience, our camp is what Burning Man is, a Clusterf*ck while united.
name: ClusterF*ck United

description: The Hen House is a space created solely by strong, creative women who welcome all citizens of BRC to participate in a hip hop dance routine, drag prom, and low key tea time.
name: Hen House

description:
Our art is cooking and hosting our friends !
Come around 7pm to enjoy a diner with 50-60 strangers every-night. Great food and amazing evening guaranteed...

During the day, come and relax in our lounge or meditate in our dome. We will also offer a variety a day time activities: art and beer, tea and meditation, healing session...

Hometown: San Francisco / Paris
name: Spoonful of Friends

description:
LED Dinosaur is Burning Man's best preparty destination.  Come by in the evening to grab some LEDs & cold beer while you dance in our giant dinosaur.

During the day we'll have lectures and mindfulness workshops!
name: LED Dinosaur

description: At Stag Camp, we invite anyone and everyone (drama free) including singles, couples and small groups from all walks of life. We have no strict regiment of things to do or fees to pay. We all just come and hang out, creating a community among ourselves that is unique, fun and will be whatever you make of it!
name: Stag Camp

description: Volunteer Village - Home of the Volunteer Resource Team.   Come by and ask us about volunteer opportunities and how you can participate while on the playa.
name: The Volunteer Village

description: The Ancient Cult of the Alligator is a place for worshippers to live in the NOW. Come by for daily afternoon activities, featuring specialty drinks (Alligator Bites!), music to replenish your soul, activities to refresh your mind and body, and, the hallmark of any good cult, a soupcon of brainwashing so light you won't notice till it's too late and you're one of us.
name: Ancient Cult of the Alligator

description: False Profit pays dividends to investors in the form of innovative cultural experiences and immersive community. Invest wisely; the life you enjoy may be your own.
name: False Profit, Inc.

description: Alchemy Stop is a dusty sanctuary for anyone to enjoy a quiet musical retreat with a cold limoncello or a steamy Italian coffee in hand. Look for our old timey piano, bar and block printing stations - we will be welcoming you with open arms.
name: Alchemy Stop

description: When an individual enters the Factory, they can expect to be greeted by an overworked, underpaid linesman, who's pension was recently revoked, producing the finest quality Froth that the Playa has ever seen. They will promptly be presented with a contract, stipulating the terms of their employment at the Factory. Triple shifts are expected. Come join us for one of our soon to be playa famous events every day during the week.
name: Factory

description: Come hang out with us! At Black Hole Literary Society, we provide good times day and night, activities for the young and the forever young including: "adult"-ish color and chill zone, life size Lite Brite, conversation and rest by day, and music, play, and black lights by night! Shabbat pot luck.
name: Black Hole Literary Society

description: The hangout for washed up, down on their luck Robots in need of a bit of fuel and lubrication.
name: Android Anonymous

description: Camp Corny Find your spirit animal.  Put em on a Pole.  Thrust them to the beat.  They're out of fucking control!
name: Camp Corny

description:
Camp Stranger Danger:
A fork in the road of life 
Wash before using
name: STRANGER DANGER

description: Join us to become a boss of that dough, by imagining and bringing cookie concoctions to life.  Whether you're a no bake, half-baked or a full-baked kind of person, we'll supply the best cookies for everyone on the playa. Dough-n't you think cookies are a sweet way to treat people?  We're a group of Mad Batters with civic responsibility, ready to bake the world into a better place.  Mad Batter will be serving cookies MWF in the afternoon around sunset, targeting the sweet time spot, just around snack time.
name: Mad Batter

description: Imaginarium: for Synthetic Sensations; getting real, with the simulated.
hometown: We are primarily in Seattle and the Bay Area
name: Imaginarium

description: If you could bring one more principle to the playa what would it be?
name: Eleventh Principle

description:
Nightchaser 
We are a creative collective of artists, musicians, djs and lovers throwing evening disco parties and a party bar for everyone to enjoy! 

https://www.facebook.com/NightchaserCampSTL/
name: Nightchaser

description: Come to our circus tent to drink yerba mate, skank, and enjoy dub music. We will be relaxing, thriving, creating, burning. We have a glow in the dark teether ball court ,and warm tea urns going all night.
name: Nom De Plume

description: Pick a card at Self-Fulfilling Prophecy Camp!  Our skeptical psychics and irreverent fortune tellers will tell you what may or may not happen in your future.  Or try the other side of the table!  Explore our library of divination devices and tell some fortunes of your own.
name: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy Camp

description: The Hack-a-Cola soda fountain serves up cold, delicious sodas in Black Rock City.
hometown: Gerlach! (the camp lead lives in Gerlach, but the rest of the camp is Bay Area)
name: Hack-a-Cola

description:
Priscilla, Queen of the Doof! 
Wait, who is she and what is she Queen of?? 
She is a giant pink bus full of fabulous Australians! 
The Doof is Australian for electronic music party and all the color and sparkles that go along with the scene. 
Priscilla is a big pink party bus full of fantastic party people! 
Come check it out, we are very friendly.
name: Priscilla, Queen of the Doof!

description: PlayaNauts! come play! we have an artcar, Bar, Aerial Rig and some giant Games, come say hello for our 10th year on the playa!
name: PlayaNauts

description: Come get your amber on: amber, amber beverages, amber lights, amber people, and amber dust. Open 24/7. Sausage Thursday.
name: Amber Dust

description:
We connect you with the world, we are the ONLY way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for years. We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark!, and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon.

On-playa updates: http://twitter.com/brcpo9
name: PO9

description: Enter hot steam universe to purify your mind, depurate your body and reborn through cleansing Banya experience!
name: Banya

description: Find Sutro Tower and then come draw on our mural, have an ice coffee, a PBR-tini, and all the Mission hipster irony and sarcasm you can take.  Enjoy our burritos on Wednesday and ice coffee every day!
name: Mission District

description: The BRC HOA prides itself on offering a wide range of options for any prospective Black Rock City homeowner. Hydration! Dehydration! Art! Craft! Heckling (the good kind AND the bad kind) and so much more!
name: BRCHOA

description: Steam Bath Project offers a playa twist on the ritual cleansing tradition and embraces the possibility of transformation.
name: Steam Bath Project

description: Camp No Bikini Atoll is a enclave of dancers, doers, awareness awakeners, movers, and shakers of shakas. As ambassadors of aloha and purveyors of pacific positivity, we strive to reach the masses with our message of light and love, to perpetuate the energy of collective kindness, understanding, and creativity as we voyage into the waters of the future.
name: Camp No Bikini Atoll

description: Stellar Dusty Moon is an out of this world experience that blends artistic expression, live music, performances, and a wide variety of interactive workshops, all with the accompaniment of delicious craft cocktails from our Full Moon Saloon! Our mission is to provide a comfortable environment to get silly, get sexy, and get fun with our galactic visitors, so come get cheeky with us!!
name: Stellar Dusty Moon

description:
Social Cancer is an All-Theme Themeless Theme Camp made up of a core of 8 veteran burners and has a total of 14 members. Each member is carefully selected to ensure the "secret recipe" to the flavor of the camp is beautifully blended and complementary to the village in which we reside.

Over the years, we have learned that instead of quantity, we want quality in our camp. That means that every scheduled camp event is always "All Hands on Deck"!  All of the camp members, unless engaged in a volunteer shift, are to be present and contributing to the overall feel of each event theme, including drinks, music, and heckling.   

We strive to make our events as interactive as possible, from personally making each individual drink to the Shenanigans of our Lifeguards urging you to practice "Safety Third!", or our Police Force that will assign you "community service" before you get to enjoy that drink. Each day, we have scheduled events for no less than 4 hours per day.
name: Social Cancer

description: Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments has diversified to bring you a carefully curated selection of participatory options. With a nod to our past we have created a distinctly smaller version of our big, imposing board of stuff for you to find, do or be. Last year's remote controlled shenanigans will also be available to you the citizens. Should you desire something more thoughtful we are hosting not one but two talks on subjects yet to be divulged. If none of that suits you there's always beer...from the Dumpster Divebar!
name: Dr. Carl's Collection of Depts.

description:
The Camp for Sensual Pleasures is dedicated to providing pleasure for women in an environment that's sensual, safe, comfortable & private.  

The well-known Orgasamator Experience is back, enhanced to give women an even more intensely enjoyable experience, and the very popular Eros Tangeré, an Erotic Sensation Performance, is also returning.
name: Sensual Pleasures (The Camp for)

description: Come join us for some live piano music!
name: Piano Bar

description: The Mansonian Institute 4 Urban Studies celebrates and teaches Burningman history through large graphic informational banners and take-offs of each year's theme with data going back to the first event. Stop by and ask us questions about Burningman history, get some swag and daily events. See our Museum of Burningman Artifacts or artful facts?! It's got to be seen to be believed, or not. Tubatron, the Flaming Tuba Guy, may be firing up also! Tuesday at 1:00 PM there will by Burningman T-shirt transfers – bring a blank t-shirt and leave with a Burningman t-shirt! There will be two Talks –  Wednesday at 5:30 by Will Chase , former Communication Director for Burningman (Jack Rabbit Starts) and Thursday at 5:30 by Nora Adkinson, Curator  Renwick  Gallery Exhibit at the Smithsonian Museum "No Spectators: The Art of Burning Man". Come and learn about Burningman and ask questions/get answers.
name: Mansonian Institute 4 Urban Study

description: Bicycle repair, full service & DIY.  Also, massage, foot washing, body painting, piano for all to play.
name: Elliot's Bicycle Service

description:
Bubbly Ever After is a community of cheeky Happiness Agents that seek to empower people to feel better about themselves in a world that that they are helping to improve.

BEE is looking forward to creating nurturing community experiences that provide healing, abundance, love and authentic connection at Black Rock City and beyond.

+ A Heavenly Shanti Affirmation & Restore Lounge that will be open 24/7 for anyone looking for a place to connect learn and grow in a safe, healthy and friendly space with affirmation stations, pampering and more.
+ A Bubbly Celebration of Life on Tuesday calling all Burner Birthday Babes to come share a toast. 
+A champagne lingerie picnic on Friday. 
+A schedule of talks and workshops on the state of this planet, health, When Robots and Humans Meet, abundance, sustainable systems, trust, self love, mindful leadership, meaningful innovation and more. 
+A sign up sheet for folks who want to host a support group meeting or play some music in our communal space.
name: Bubbly Ever After

description:
You stumble through the night and into a small open doorway, clicking your EL wire off and wiping the playa from your eyes. You blink in the dim flicker of oil lamps, a chandelier swinging overhead. This place seems somehow familiar. 

You have found yourself in the Copper Ruins, a harbor for wayward drifters lost in the dust. Be gathered in and welcomed. Peruse the experiential wares in the Great Hall, catch a glimpse behind the veil of the Copper Theater, and explore what Mystery the night has in store for you. The Copper Ruins--where this time the dream will have you.
name: The Copper Ruins

description:
The sky's the limit, and welcome about the "747 Experience". entering the 747 aircraft, the largest moving art car ever to grace Burning Man, each visitor will be checked onto the plane, and through the Insecurity Checkpoint where they can receive hugs and praise from our crew members and volunteers. Proceeding further into the 747 fuselage, they will be asked to fill out an Emotional Baggage Tag, to let go of anything holding them back.  Once completed, they hang the tag on the wall of baggage handles. Next, a flight attendant asks them for their destination (where they are going on their journey through life), which will be shared on a Boarding Pass.  This pass is hung onto the Destination wall. Once completed, the traveler is given a pair of airplane wings. 
Come and be inspired, and dream of what is possible, while letting go of the things that hold you back in life.
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco and New York
name: 747 Big Imagination

description:
We are a nautical Nicolas Cage theme camp here to help answer the question -- You can cage a shark, but can you shark a Cage?  

(spoiler: we sure did)
name: Camp Shark Cage

description:
TO UNEXPECTED ADVENTURES AND TEA, IN OUR DUSTY PARADISE.
We focus on celebration of life, awakening transformation and spontaneity with workshops, ceremony and parties with a range of carefully curated dj's to provide a camp that is filled with mystery, excitement and even some delightfully healing gifts. Let us linger in the beautiful foolishness of things, and revel in our playful essence.
name: SERENDIPITEA

description: Salute Your Jorts is a camp about good ol' fashion family fun
name: Salute Your Jorts

description: GloryWhole is an agglomeration of fun activities, hospitality, music, and art. Welcoming you on your meanders around the streets of the Black Rock City. This tiny oasis embraces diversity and serendipity, humbly promises to invigorate passersby and send them back to the mysteries of the playa refreshed and re-energized.
name: GloryWhole

description: A beautiful house music oasis is created with an elegant dance floor flanked by inviting chill spaces on all sides. We cultivate an environment conducive for fun, love and good times. We an international bunch of dreamers and doers from all walks.
name: Never Sleep Again

description: A cartoon gameshow oasis, providing a wild interactive experience that keeps it surreal. The Price is Wrong, Bitch!
name: Larynx Lounge

description: Join DECENTRAL in Anahasana Village to learn more about the Unstoppable Decentralized Revolution that is happening. New tools are empowering communities and individuals to build a new way to live, govern, connect, and exchange with each other. Learn more by joining us at our many talks, in our dome and on the DECENTRAL Stage, and please teach us more about the experiments your communities have undertaken so we can build this new world, together.
name: DECENTRAL

description:
People of Color Camp (POC) is a Melanin kaleidoscope, all hues, all colors, all nations, all religions, and all gender identities are welcome to express their visions. We invite dreams sprung from every corner of the Earth, especially dreams outside of America and those suppressed within it. 

POC is an intentional tribe with an eye on recreating our Playa family in the real world.  

A living experiment in creating a family outside America's socioeconomic defaults. We are a foundation for a peaceful future. Come and build with us!
name: People of Color Camp

description:
I, Reboot 
Let us help you feel human and LOVED. Leave our camp feeling rebooted and ready to play!
name: I, Reboot

description: 1001 Nights is a warmly inviting, casually laid-back, heavily oriental-influenced lounge space. Our variety of community Dome offerings are here to please the masses from starting the day with yoga, sharing love through our unique Makateeb experience, releasing into a delicate cranial sacral massages, transforming your look with a personalized braiding session, withdrawing from the playa commotion for an afternoon Tea laying in comfortable Majlis seating, to dancing the night away under the stars.  We are confident you will enjoy paying us a visit. Artists from all horizons are welcome to flow into the Dome and jam their tunes and share their talents.
name: 1001 Nights

description: The Deus Ex Detective Agency is a theme camp dedicated to bringing the era of hard-boiled 1940's detective noir to the playa. It is both an artistic space to explore and a dramatic interaction with live characters in our fictional world. We provide ambient experiences and planned events, within our theme area and across Black Rock City.
name: Deus Ex Detective Agency

description: The Arrakis Spice Market provides a communal spice market and gathering place and spice-infused cocktail bar. We gift spices and related culinary items and craft cocktails from 1-4 pm Monday-Saturday.
name: Arrakis Spice Market

description: HammerAndCyclery.com is a resource for bicycle-related Playa-prep, how to keep bikes moving in the dust, and what to do with your ride after Burning Man (Give it to us. We'll send it to Africa!). Connect with our camp any time of year, see a list of our on-Playa events, join us in Minneapolis for year-round events, learn our camp story, or support us by renting a bike.
name: Hammer And Cyclery

description: Inflation Station provides 24/7 bike tire repair and replacement services which encourage participants to learn bike repair techniques through guided instruction.  Come relax is our shaded bike repair lounge while fixing your bike and enjoy a cold bar beverage while checking out our unique costume exchange area.
name: Inflation Station

description: Amid the clouds and dust, a glorious steampunk airship appears on the horizon—Airpusher is returning to dock! Skytown is bustling with activity, ready to entertain, refresh, and resupply voyagers before they set off on their next adventures.
name: Skytown

description: Wet your whistle at Spank the Monkey Bar, enjoy virgin-burner shots, playa-friendly poontang as well as other refreshing beverages.  They come with free harassment from our assortment of monkey-clad bartenders, we'll try not to throw poo.
name: Spank The Monkey Bar

description:
Come by to have some mates every morning and learn how to prepare it the traditional way. Also take home a souvenir fro Fuego Austral, the only regional burn in Latin America.

On Thursday show your Gaucho's skills at the Guachopartooza, a Pampa's Rodeo BRC Style.
name: Gauchos del Fuego

description: We welcome our robot overlords… but your humanity is still sacred at Pink Heart. Re-calibrate your human body, mind and spirit with chilled cucumber water or vegan ice cream.  Share your experiences (and yourself) on our pink fur couches while gazing upon the open Playa.
name: Pink Heart

description: A calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis, where Burners of every sexual proclivity can enjoy a cold drink, a snack, and a deep conversation stoked by intrusive (yet illuminating!) personal question cards. Come every afternoon for our daily events!
name: Rainbow OASIS

description: Yurt Cafe serves afternoon tea, authenticity, and presence inside a beautiful Mongolian style yurt.
name: Yurt Cafe

description: Three of Cups
name: Three of Cups

description:
BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES! Magical Mystery Adventure Tours 2X daily, for our Burning Man Community. That means you! We go where  we want to go, sometimes, and where you do too, sometimes. We have room for about 16 people,  priority given to the Mobility challenged, followed by the Walking Wounded and then the Able Bodied, first come are first served. Looking to score some of our tours with musical themes, and such - the ideas we have thus far:
-Grateful Dead Sing-a-Long Tour
-Black Metal Sing-a-Long Tour
- 5 minute Poetry Readings Tour (Read yours or someone else's)
-Nerd Tour
-Silence Tour
-Discovery Tour
-You be the DJ Tour
-DIY Tour
- Bring a paper and Pencil-type thing Tour
Tour Ideas welcome!

Please visit us at www.blackrockadventures.org, send your tour ideas, and see where we will be taking off from - 2X daily!
name: BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES!

description: The playa can be exhausting! Need a refuel and some fun? Stop by Something Spacey for the galaxies best Bloody Mary, a crepe made by a Frenchman from Earth, and get a foot soak face mask spa treatment in our SpaceSpa! Come have your galactic passport made and do some dancing with us, then recharge with some Rocket Fuel and a SpaceDilla for your night out!
name: Something Spacey

description:
Overhead water misters and temporary tattoos offered all day and week long.
DIY Essential Oil Body Sprays offered Monday-Saturday from 11 am - 3 pm
name: Tahoe-Monterey Misters & Sisters

description: We REALLLY want you come paint with us and drink tea. That's not sarcasm...
name: CzarGasm

description: Camp Fingerbang is dedicated to raising the level of inappropriateness on the playa - Join us for our annual WEDNESDAY PEP RALLY - Cheer Team and All! We are a delightfully ridiculous group. We do not take ourselves seriously at all and neither will you when you come to visit.
name: Camp FingerBang

description: Bathrobe camp is a state of mind--amble in adorned in the robe, caftan, muumuu, peignoir, or kimono of your choice, or borrow one of ours.  Join us for daily fashion shows, sunrise art tours, discussion salons, pool noodle dueling, or shibari style body harnesses.
name: Bathrobe Camp (within Gigsville)

description: The Secret Gentlemen's Club is a place in which a person—ladies can, of course, be the most Secret Gentlemen of all—be they commoner or king, aristocrat or ruffian, can be the fanciest version of themselves; our mission is to bring manners, culture, refinement, top-notch cocktailcrafting and expert gamesmanship and to this savage land. The Secret Gentlemen's Club politely reminds you that proper attire is required (or will be provided).
name: The Secret Gentlemen's Club

description: Here comes the sun. Beautiful beats and positive vibrations overflow the Playa at Nutz Sunrise Parties. Get some.
name: NuTz Camp

description: We're a lounge and rest-stop for wanderers who want to get off their feet for a while. If you favor a community built on the intimacies of storytelling and consensual touch, if you need a break from bar-crawling and the sonic hypnotics of booty shaking, if swinging is in any way your thing, then this could be your place. With adult-oriented events and play space cuz some of us swing that way too; consent means not being too afraid to ask.
name: Things That Swing

description: Meow Now provides mirror-based interactive art installations, interactive photo-cut-outs, and interactive sound experiences using immersive bass.
name: Meow Now

description: In an age where even Black Rock City is threatened by the Matrix, the FAFF Lounge provides the antidote to robotic control over your life. Burners are running around BRC in harried straight lines from Point A to Point B like electric squirrels -- overscheduled, and decidedly under-faffed.  The FAFF Lounge disrupts the madness with a space uniquely designed to ritually unravel your expectations in a deeply therapeutic decompression space, the perfect place for burnt-out Type A Burners to faff!
name: FAFF Lounge

description: Campy Camp dedicates itself to daily activities for all BRC campers and supports the playa's unabashed queerness by offering visitors regular summer camp-themed events and experiences that help them sense a place of inclusion, entertainment, and of course the opportunity to earn merit badges -- BRC style.
name: Campy Camp

description:
Houpla is Houston's largest theme camp and part of the Houston Burners non-profit organization. We specialize in bringing new burners to the playa each year and providing friendly, Texas-style hospitality.

Come by to play our hoopla carnival game and win a prize. Put on our homemade robot costumes and take photos. Take a ride with us on our battery-shaped mutant vehicle. Toast marshmallows with us and beat your drum at our fire pit. Hang out with us under our shade structure in our lounge. Everyone's welcome!

After Burning Man, join us weekly on Wednesday evenings at our warehouse space in Houston and at our annual Houston-area regional burn Unbroken Spring in March. Everyone's welcome! Learn more at www.houstonburners.org
name: Houpla

description: Everyone Welcome! Interactive all ages games available.  Robot Unicorn Attack, Robot Ring Toss and Robot parts games. Robot parking available.
name: Pinkee's Truck Stop (Camp Ynot)

description:
1. Manifesting Ideas into Reality
2. Bringing Burning Man Principles to The World
3. Safety
name: The Garage

hometown: New York, LA, Vegas, New Orleans
name: Trifucta

description: Come relax under the rabbit-dome, get your morning coffee while discovering unique art pieces and browsing through our vinyls collection. All bunnies welcome!
name: Le Lapin

description: HEX Collective - tantalize the 5 senses and get your HEXy on!
name: HEX Collective

description: Lola is the place for spontaneity and serendipity. Come Monday through Friday from 11am – 1pm for couples healing touch instruction. 2pm - 4pm for healing touch therapy.
name: Lola

description: Come to Light Faire for some quick and flashy fun with nature's favorite particle, the photon. See what they can do when they fly through holes and bend and bounce around.
name: Light Faire

description: DISORIENT is an international art collective returning for its 18th consecutive year on playa. DISORIENT is our never-ending pursuit to gift experiences to our worldwide Burner family and Black Rock City.
name: DISORIENT

description:
We channel happiness. We cherish all kind of self-expression. Listen to your body and share it with us. 
Wanna dance?
Wanna eat?
Wanna sing?
Wanna heal?
Wanna freak out?
Wanna feel?
Come share/dance/feel/act/sing with us putos.
name: DISCO PUTOS

description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday and Friday at 5:00pm for BRC's one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You're guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.
name: Frogma

description: crashing high-stamping asses daily ,viewing from scaffolding of brc.
name: Crashing High

description:
Humano is a place to connect with yourself and likeminded individuals, which use tools such as arts, culture and music to spark human progression.

Humano is an ideology, a place where you can free your mind, your soul can dance and your heart can flourish. A place where we connect in the pursuit of happiness. Happiness here is being free. Free to be yourself, to do any and all things possible.
name: Humano

description: Lovin' Oven @ Desert Morning: Greet the morning, and let the smell of our freshly baked bread draw you into our oasis, where we will will soothe your soul and nourish your body.  Since 2011 we've been serving hungry, dusty, lovely Burners hot Tuscan Flatbread, organic jams and fresh mint tea and entertainment with funky DJs and eclectic performances. Our bread is lovingly baked by our campmates in our beautiful wood-fired Lovin' Oven. In the middle of the desert: hot, dry and dusty, we bake bread. Every morning. Just for you! Performers needing a space or anyone wanting to use the oven, please drop by and see us or email us in advance.
name: Lovin Oven @ Desert Morning

description:
Art Car Camp
Come visit with some of the Playa's favorite Art Cars and Mutant Vehicles
name: Art Car Camp

description: The heart of the Big Easy come to Black Rock City, including cocktails, bakery, fresh roasted coffee, live music and burlesque, wine cellar, vineyard, Mardi Gras, Jazz Funeral for the Man, and a few other surprises. Our French Quarter buildings are based on an open design that your camp can build to join us. And this year, look for Asiatown!
name: Black Rock French Quarter

description:
The Black Rock Bandits are back for a second year with our art-car Azeban, aka The Bandit, aka Trash-Panda! Follow this glowing neon creature across the playa, and experience a musical lineup of funk, disco, dance beats you won't hear anywhere else.  

There is no better way to enhance the magic of the playa than unexpectedly appearing out of the night with lights blazing, or offering rides through the city to its' citizens.   This is a smaller car that will be more approachable and accessible to the public.  We'll have room for at least eight occupants, and at night the car will be an interactive spectacle with improved LED programming.
name: Black Rock Bandits

description: We're a desert experiment. A French Toast Mecca. A home for mysterious misters. A Burner family that tastes the rainbow: a truly informal family of adventurous friends, partners, parents, children, gays, straights and everything in between. Come play with us!
name: Mystopia

description: Black Rock City outpost for citizens of Wakanda. A radically inclusive camp celebrating Afrofuturism.
name: Straight Outta Wakanda

description: Goodbye Horses is a union of global Burners (USA, Japan, Sweden & Saturn) who have met and connected through Burning Man, regional Burns and local events. We are filmmakers, inventors, circus performers, chefs, rockstars and more. It's a meeting of cultures inviting more--best known for Kernel's World Famous PopCart, home of the best popcorn on the Playa, the one and only original, no bullshit authentic desert C~O~R~N for your grit. NO WOO-WOO LA TURNKEY CORN HERE FOLKS.
name: Goodbye Horses

description: Multicultural burners mix - come get a lot of fun in the goatrampoline full of screaming plastic goat toys! Fancy some Pétanque as well? we've goat some tournaments and teaching going.
name: GoatFire

description: Playa Love: Temple Trees with your love intentions like ribbons in the sky
name: Playa Love

description: The playa base of the Intergalactic Sasquatch.
name: Intergalactic Sasquatch Village

description: The Dusty Rhino art car is a fire breathing, thumping, mobile party that brings people together through art, fire and electronic music. We provide enthusiastic participants with a unique interactive experience that alters their notions of what is possible.
name: Dusty Rhino Camp

description: The FriendZone is a safe haven for all wayward wanderers, burnt out burners or anyone else needing an escape on the playa. Come find the comfort of the FriendZone if you need an uncharged space to unwind or unravel.
name: The FriendZone

description: Salt is survival. Salt is balance. Salt is preservation. Salt is life. The Saltkin invite all of Black Rock City to celebrate, consume, and learn mostly true facts about salt.
name: Saltkin

description: Come visit us for ramen that is Ofosho so good!
name: Ofosho

description: Bandlands Bordello. A post apocalyptic brothel. In the post Trump world, aka the apocalypse, the first profession will be the last.  Come to the bordello and seek the pleasures that lie within. All are welcome who know the password. Speak friend, and enter.
name: The Badlands Bordello

description: Chilled pudding served daily. BYOC & chill out with us!
name: Chill Pudding Camp

description: Camp Conduit reinvents itself as Campocalypse - gifting bondage rope, suspension bondage rides, instruction in knot-tying and safety techniques, ice water floggings, and Tarot card readings to the masses.
name: Campocalypse

description: The home of Awesome!(ness), providing and inviting all to enjoy music, art, performances, and good times.  From crafts events to daily parties, come get AWESOME with us!
name: Awesome!(ville)

description:
Get Involved!  Volunteer!
Part of being a good Black Rock Citizen is communal effort.  Not sure how?  Come to the V-Spot and we can show you and plug you in.  We have volunteer opportunities for everyone.  Volunteer to help your community.  Volunteer to help the event run.  Volunteer to help build art. Volunteer to be more involved and a part of the magic.
name: V-Spot 3

description: Waterworks Customer Service Office
name: DPW WaterWorks

description:
Get Involved!  Volunteer!
Part of being a good Black Rock Citizen is communal effort.  Not sure how?  Come to the V-Spot and we can show you and plug you in.  We have volunteer opportunities for everyone.  Volunteer to help your community.  Volunteer to help the event run.  Volunteer to help build art. Volunteer to be more involved and a part of the magic.
name: V-Spot 9

description:
Get Involved!  Volunteer!
Part of being a good Black Rock Citizen is communal effort.  Not sure how?  Come to the V-Spot and we can show you and plug you in.  We have volunteer opportunities for everyone.  Volunteer to help your community.  Volunteer to help the event run.  Volunteer to help build art. Volunteer to be more involved and a part of the magic.
name: V-Spot

description:
Deep Tea Haus
Yunnan pu'erh. Moroccan rugs. Leipzig techno. Nonlocal psychic phenomena.
name: Deep Collective

description:
Make the Least of your Burn. Come join us for slumber parties and
morning cartoons.
name: Pajama Burn

description: Foam Against the Machine
name: Foam Against the Machine

description:
Sin City's own fire tribe born in 2016 with the sole intent of participating here at Burning Man. We have succeeded for 2 consecutive years so far! 

Illuminalia will be teaching prop manipulation classes this year (fire staff, dragon staff, hoop, poi, rope dart, ect) as well as opening a massage parlor, having tea and cookies, fixing fire tools, and gifting a few things here and there. Come by and say hi!
name: Illuminalia's HQ

description: Come where love is always in fashion, dancing is a way of life and every person you know is waiting. Grab some beautiful threads, have a drink and dance till there's holes in your shoes. This camp is devoted to turning your energy UP!! We will have Beats Droppin, Booze Flowin and a Boutique to enhance your style on the playa! Our positive and loving vybes will make your stay at our camp epic!
name: Beats Boutique

description: Honey Puddle is your shimmering golden oasis wherein chill vibes, brilliant live music, and masterfully brewed honey wines (meads), craft beers, and cocktails await. Come enjoy our people, our drink, our welcoming, warm, intimate cuddle puddle
name: Honey Puddle

description: Welcome to Planet Awesome!
name: Camp Camp Camp

description: Pyrotex - Fire Collective - Spin Camp
name: PyroTex

description:
Come one, come ALL! Awaken your inner flow artist! Self expression in the kinetic form! Renown Flow Masters! Sages with wisdom of health! Thinkers and Tinkers! YOU!
Take a class, teach a class. Watch a show, show n' tell! Experience the core principals like never before!
name: My Monkey, My Circus

description: Exercise Your Demons, take aim at the Hyman of Calamity, blow it, lick it, stick it & win VSG 2018 glow cups. Voodoo Shooting Gallery open sunrise to sunset, Zombie Lounge open, hosted by VooDoo Kitty and T3, Uncle. bill and the Jeffery approved for a shiit ton of acculturated fun!
name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery

description:
Come see the BaoChickaWowWow village, find rest in the shade and taste our buns: fresh steamed-to-order pork, red-bean and veggie bao (chinese dim-sum buns).

Join us for BrunchBao, NightBao or the food themed Far East Night Market!
name: BaoChickaWowWow

description: An arts support camp for the Honorarium Project "Luna Flora", a 15 foot tall blooming lotus with a moon at her center.
name: The Arcognomies

description: We are an art support camp for Kinesios.  We are here to answer questions about our art, discuss the nature technology in our lives, generally philosophize about the nature of life, or just shoot the shit  and, if there's enough interest, we'll even go out with you for a tour.   And of course if you helped make Kinesios a reality we'll be giving out the best hugs on the playa.
name: Kinesios

description: DISTRIKT - Bringing art & beats together - A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ's, original art, and luscious blended libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dance, debaucherous and disorderly, DISTRIKT. You, our guests, are also our performers so BRING IT!
name: DISTRIKT - Bike Battalion

description: This year Deep Orbit is our base for providing support to our art, EI-Robot, which will be performing live art on Playa building 4-foot diameter illuminated steel sculptures in real time.
name: Deep Orbit

description:
Camp ONE is calling upon all i-Robots, wisdom keepers; from global indigenous tribes, leaders and creators of all ages from various facets of our modern world. We believe the creation of a new earth is interdependent on the co-operative efforts of those passionately leading the way to what is sustainable and regenerative. We invite you to share knowledge, tell stories, sing, and drum around sacred fire. Join in performing the largest dance circle with our Native American families. Learn from a wide array of available classes with topics in health, sciences, finance & alternative currencies, technologies, and more - you would not want to miss! Share your vision and mission with everyone as we compile them to inspire generations -in years to come!

Camp ONE is here to facilitate global-wide co-operation and co-creation to manifest a true sustainable future and harmony with all life on our home planet - Earth. A family that burns together, stays together! 

“We are all indigenous because we are borne from the same Earth. We are ALL wisdom keepers  - We trek different roads leading to the same destination ~ H. Angeles
name: Camp One New Earth aka Camp ONE

description: The Miscellaneous Heathens - lovers, players, and merry makers. Stop by for a good conversation, a game, and a guided-self-help.
name: The Miscellaneous Heathens

description: Circle of Friends Camp - designers and builders of the Circle of Friends project with a preview in 2018 with full project in 2019.
name: Circle of Friends Camp

description: Friendly easy-going camp. Stop by and say "hi!"
name: Saints & Sinners

description: Art Support since 2011. We are supporting The Crack this year.
name: Dazed and Confuzed

description: The Moon Saloon is the wonkiest tonkiest space cowboy saloon on the playa!
name: The Moon Saloon

description: Franchise Freedom support camp. Franchise Freedom is a performative 600 drone light sculpture that will fly over the playa like a flock of birds every night.
name: Drift

description:
iBurn is a 10 year project to give burners access to events, art and camps in relation t their own GPS location. It is a free app for iPhone and android but does not connect to the outside world but is downloaded to your phones memory before you get to Burning Man.
All you need is a clear view of the sky.  https://iburnapp.com/
name: Burning Man Earth

description:
At Cohesion, you always arrive to a welcoming crew of happy individuals. Whether we are hollering on our megaphones, dancing, drinking, or sitting in the shade we pride ourselves on being a cohesive unit of weirdos ranging in all ages and vibes.

COME TICKLE YOUR TUTU TUESDAY PARTY: 3-7PM

Come to our party for a Polish & Paint. Sorry guys, that's not a blowjob. It's a mini facial (again, not the money shot) and face paint station. After you've freshened up enjoy a fresh cocktail and help us get the dance party started.

Any other day of the week you can find us at the bar. Come try your luck and see if it's open. *Hint: We like sunset.
name: COHESION

description: Our enchantment with, and disenchantment from, the modern world are not so easy to distinguish from each other - They exist in a reciprocal relationship. Rosa Parks sued Outkast. The key to happiness isn't the search for meaning, it's to just keep yourself busy with random nonsense till you die. A time period called, they want their object back. Nilbog! It's goblin spelled backwards! 7 Minutes!
name: Spaghetti Burritos

description: The Dustopia Collective is a group of makers that work on overlapping projects for Burning Man and beyond.
name: Dustopia

description: Come enjoy a piece of the old west at Burning Man.  Entertainment includes an open bar, mechanical bull, live entertainment, large dance floor, giant rocking horses and games!
name: Silver City

description: Bust open your mind with physically semi-risky and thought provoking activities.
name: FunKuhShuhn

description: Art of Steam is the camp around healing tradition through Steam and Plants.
name: Art of Steam

description: Ocean360   Bringing the Ocean to the Desert with a message of Conservation, Sustainability, Emerging Technologies and Educational Outreach
name: Malice in Underpants

description: Silicon Village is a gathering of theme camps which offer great activities, tasty vittles, and cold (hopefully) beverages to the thirsty and hungry and those in need to entertainment.  We have everything from a climbing wall to mutant vehicles which go on deep playa art tours, to pizza and adult beverages at our 21 and over bar and everything (except out bar) is kid-friendly.
name: M.U.S.E.

description: PEPPERLAND - Our great, welcoming camp is a 12-year landmark, with all kinds of fun and diverse, active participation for everyone on the Playa. See our colorful website, too, for more smiles, fun, and info: https://www.facebook.com/groups/198208360209399/ , and see even more.
name: Pepperland

description: Join us for an energetic, easy to learn, tribal-feeling form of group dancing known as contradancing.  We dance every night to amazing live music - everything from traditional celtic to an electronic mix of DJ'd records and live instruments.  There is a "caller" who leads, but there is still room for dancers to improvise and embellish.  There is no need to arrive with a partner - most dancers swap after each dance.  Lines of couples flow through each other creating a bonding, playful, noncompetitive, beautifully geometric, community dance for all ages and skill levels.  There is no required footwork and contra is possible for many with disabilities.  If you are smiling, you are doing it right.  Everyone who shows up will have fun.  Morning dance or yoga instruction.  Swing and waltzes.  Afternoon chill space, music jams.
hometown: San Francisco CA, Gainesville FL, Morgantown WV
name: Contradance Community Camp

description: Extravafuckingganza
name: Extravafuckingganza

description:
Enjoy the best green tea and sake on the playa in our relaxing and welcoming tea lounge.  Take some time to visit our Bijou Boutique's collection of fine jewelry, and join one of our artists to make your own.  

Sling some ink with Squids of the Sumi-e dojo.
We'll load your tentacles up with our homemade brushes and let you experience large scale sumi-e painting! This is sumi-e painting as a flow art. 

Need to relax?  chill out with some Tibetan singing bowl meditation.
name: Jipangu

description: Functional Nightmare Agency (F'NA) is here to make your worst/best nightmares come to life! Join us on chaotic weird quests and immersive experiences to tantalize and thrill you!
name: Functional Nightmare Agency

description: Our camp keeps our fellow Burners biking: our repair shop offers education,  tools and parts, for bike repair. Actually we'll help you repair just about anything, but bikes are our specialty. We also love to mix drinks and host visitors in our adjacent lounge. We have a strong eco focus; we have been running on solar power for years, plus we recycle and reuse as much as possible.
name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe

description: We are bringing a reimagined Globe Theatre to the Playa and filling it with people witnessing one another speaking with joy, passion, abandon, specificity, imagination, irreverence, humor and pathos.
name: Burning Globe

description: 3SP (Third Space Place) celebrates "third spaces" — relaxing, social places that offer a real sense of welcome and belonging beyond home ("first space") and work ("second space"). As a true "third space" of radical inclusion and immediacy, 3SP's comfy retreat from the sun and dust features interactive events on weekdays and casual conversation in between times with 3SP camp members and fellow passers-by, all of whom are encouraged to stop in and participate with us!
name: 3SP (Third Space Place)

description: The Avant Yard has been a theme camp since 2008 but our founders first tasted dust in 2006. We are affiliated with the Arts Diaspora, an international network of artists, healers and do-gooders who meet once a year at Burning Man to produce art, connect with new Gnomies (members of our community) and find new ways to empower each other to do wonderful things.
name: The Avant Yard

description: Start your morning with a fried bologna sandwich to coat your stomach & a bourbon shot to rinse the Playa from your throat. We bring sweet Kentucky hospitality, combining elements of sweet down home with a sprinkling of agro/punk for spicing up the scene.
name: Kentucky Fried Camp

description:
Rogue Nation Village is home to a group of camps from the Pacific Northwest: Kreme Burners, Kona Zona, SeaWEED, and Dope Sauce.
Seattle's diverse village for the amazing French dessert Crème Brulée TWICE during the burn, authentic Mexican tacos, quesadillas, margaritas, a full bar, a piano lounge, a hookah lounge, outdoor games (trampoline, balance boards) and a big chill space known as "Comfort" to host various workshops.
name: Rogue Nation

description: Black Rock & Roll every day at sunset. Pianos, guitars, bass, drums, synths, full PA system. We build the stage. You build the story.
name: Platybus & the Band

description:
To All Playa Pilgrims:

No matter how dusty, tired, or JUST. DONE..., Thou art welcome to enjoy the amenities at our humble medieval diner and rest stop.  Serving daily grilled cheeses, pickles and virgin Mary's, we are also ALWAYS open for shade and water.  Replenish your spirit AND your stomach at The Hangry Bishop!
name: Hangry Bishop

description:
Heroes & Super Villains is an exploration of integrating all the best from the Light and the Shadow in individual, group and societal settings. We offer hospitality for those on their own Hero's Journey, mischievous assignments of intrigue and henchmen for those aspiring Super Villains with visions of taking over the world. 

Open from noon til sunset, drop in for guided meditation, our sophisticated slow bar with craft cocktails, sexy soulful music, missions, therapy and storytelling. 

Friday is our epic SOUL BRUNCH with world class DJs & delicious treats.
name: Heroes & Super Villains

description:
Camp Fuego hosts the F.U.EGO Bar, No Mercy Stage & Backstage A/C Lounge, serving daily the playa's only ORGANIC SNOW CONES and hosting "No Mercy" and "Mo' Mercy" karaoke parties, an open mic and DJ'd dance parties. DJs and musicians welcome! 
Choose any mixed drink, spiked cone, cold craft beer or hard cider. 
"No Mercy" karaoke singers agree to be cut off at any time for any reason or no reason at all, gong standing by. "Mo' Mercy" means well-keyed voices chime in, mic volumes magically adjust and the performance sounds great. 
ALL PARTICIPANTS gain access to Fuego's Backstage VIP A/C Lounge!
Look for Camp Fuego's namesake Art Installation, "Fuego", a life-sized stretched barbed-wire prancing HORSE with flame effects coming from her eyes and mane.
name: F.U.Ego Stage Bar & Lounge

description: Rootpile is a North Carolina based themecamp whose mission is to bring live Bluegrass Music and Hillbilly food and culture to the Playa. We have nightly concerts, daily instrument workshops on instruments we provide, daily Hillbilly Olympix  and BBQ and Pinto Beans at our nightly concerts  and an open Jam on Weds afternoon at two with Pinto Beans and an Open Jam on Saturday at two pm with Pinto Beans served.
name: Rootpile

description: The makers of DiscoFish have embarked on a grand project to make something bigger and better, the all-electric TechnoGecko. Whether you've loved the DiscoFish for many years, or whether you're new to Burning Man this year, you're welcome to come by to meet her younger sibling, the TechnoGecko.
name: TechnoGecko Grotto

description:
Plays Well With Others: Provides lavender hand washing and hand pampering Tuesday through Saturday from 11:00AM to 5:00PM.
We will be having a Dance Party USA on Friday night from 6:00 to ?
name: Plays Well With Others

description: Martini Village offers cold martini's, fun cocktails, entertainment and much more!  Look us up for our daily scheduled events or just stop by and check out a random happy hour.  Be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.
name: Martini Village

description:
Camp Illuminated Tea!
We provide tea elixirs and tea ceremonies to refresh our burners, accompanied by guided meditations, open mic, and DJs
name: Reno High Vibe Tribe!

description: Airstreameri and What Not - the Best Playa Post Cards & Dusty Science Talks in Black Rock City. Because 'nothing to write home about' doesn't apply here & ignorance is not bliss. We love you people.
name: Airstreameri and What Not

description:
Did you forget to bring _____? (ie: lube, sunscreen, sunglasses, vinegar)
The PLAYa Mart at XJoy! May have just the item you need.  We all plan on radical self reliance and life happens; AND isn't it magic and confirmation when you need something, and the Playa provides!! XJoy! Stands for x-traordinary, x-static, x-cessive, x-cellent and x-treme to name a few!  We LOVE sharing the love through appreciations, hugs, games and fun. We are living life FULL and want to experience this with you.  Drop on by.
name: X Joy!

description: Pesky Playa dust packed in those head holes? We can help with that! Our decidedly *non-medical* staff can fix you up with the tools you need to clean your nose and ears. Your throat? Well, that requires an exam, possibly a CAT scan, and perhaps a shot. Most people need a shot.
name: DR. PLAYA'S EAR NOSE AND THROAT

description: Catmandu is an eclectic herd of artists, musicians, DJs, computer nerds, climbers, bike riders, and whiskey enthusiasts. We love to make people smile, and we love to have fun. We're veteran burners who have contributed theme camps, performances, art cars,
name: Catmandu

description:
StarFist proudly presents:

Our Fabulous International Tea Service! 
Monday-Saturday 2-5pm – serving a delightful selection of hot and cold infusions from around the world, served by the Stars themselves.


And of course, home to the infamous 
GO POSTAL! 	- independent message delivery service 
(at your service!). Now in it's 12th year on the playa!
Our streetfront booth is ready for you to send a message across the playa to the recipient of your choice. Please ring our bell!
Our international fleet of mystery is at your service!
name: StarFist

description: Come and visit the Fancy Flamingo Society's fancy as f*ck pizza kitchen! You will train with the finest pizza chefs in all the land and produce the fanciest playa pie known to man! No matter your skill level, you can still participate in the gift of giving a pizza surprise, and everyone knows that the gift of gifting is the best gift of all!
name: Fancy Flamingo Society (FFS)

description:
It's the return of the Evening Cartoon Party! 
Every night all Burners are invited to chill in our cinema and to enjoy a variety of breath-taking cartoons.
It's that special time when kids-at-heart get to relive the exciting ritual of non-stop cartoons. As always, this 3-hour trip into the weird and wonderful world of yesteryear's animated antics will be accompanied by an all-you-can eat popcorn. The cartoon lineup is always a mystery,
so get ready for a sugar rush and an explosion of nostalgia all wrapped up in one candy-coated package.
name: Insomnia

description: Burnstream Court is your quintessential trailer park in the burbs of Black Rock City with an Airstream trailer park philosophy.
name: Burnstream Court

description: T.B.C. is a collective of like minded individuals creating new experiences and pushing the limits of art, love and interaction.
name: T.B.C.

description: The Society for Temporal Preservation is a collection of time travelers who welcome other travelers from any when or where. In answer to your next question: yes, we do time travel.
name: Society for Temporal Preservation

description: Gigsville is one of the oldest villages on the Playa (we're turning 21 this year, hooray!). We're dedicated to fire, fun, and good old fashion jackassery. You'll find us gathered around the car that's on fire in the center of camp. No ocelots or other violations of the Gigsville Code of Conduct are allowed.
hometown: Los Angeles, Oakland, San Francisco, Austin, Houston, New York
name: Gigsville

description: we are pandemonium  ..where chaos becomes joy. where pain becomes pleasure
name: pandemonium

description: We're a bunch of gnomes who took over someone's lawn and we'll have everything a good gnomely neighbor should have. People can stop by to enjoy our lemonade stand or hang out on our pristine front lawn (replete with white picket fence) and play lawn games or take a seat in the shade of our tree / the comfort of our hammocks.
name: Gnomeman's Land

description: Directly from the Great White North, land of the maple leaf, comes the sugar shack of your dreams. Yes, a sugar shack on the Playa! Maple taffy on snow. Yes, snow on the Playa, in August. We will make it happen. Join us after dark for a taste of sweetly delicious "tire d'érable sur neige." The Dusty Beavers are an international group: Canadians, French and Americans.
name: Dusty Beavers

description: "Tu tires ou tu pointes" – Shooting or Pointing! Come along and play a pétanque game with French burners. As a French camp, drinking is never too far, so come to discover and enjoy French Liquors!
name: Dusty Frogz

description:
SwagMart is an Oasis of Gifting and Creativity located in the heart of the Black Rock Desert.

Our cherished and sought after Swag includes Man Pins, Man Date Pins, Necklaces, Earrings, Decals,Great Costume Trophies for Costume Appreciation, Playa  Postcards.

Enjoy our morning and late night Swag Coffee and Lattes, Experience making  your own  necklace's during our afternoon sessions, we supply the materials. This our 8th year of nightly Branding of Burning Man designs on your Boots, Belts, Hats etc. This will be a cherished addition to your Playa experience.

Stop by for a creative fun positive experience and meet Burners  from all over the Planet. Always close to Center Camp it the 6:00 sector.
name: SwagMart

description: Free Photography Zone has been photographing and gifting prints to the participants of BM for 22 continuous years.   All people are photographed on black and white film and besides the gift these prints are available to the participants
name: Free Photography Zone

description: Gonzo Village is where you'll find Miscreants and Bat Country serving up their usual Hunter S. Thompson inspired shenanigans; flames, machetes, explosions, strong drink and bass.
name: Gonzo Village

description: Opulent Temple - Sacred dance to world class music since 2003.
name: Opulent Chill

description: Run Free is a clean and sober Burning Man camp for folks whose common goal is enlargement of spiritual life through new adventures in being human and living life to the fullest.  The only requirement for membership is a commitment to a clean and sober Burn.  For more info, check us out on Facebook (Run Free Camp) or on our website.
name: Run Free Camp

description: Janky as Fuck brings you SPOONS AND TOONS!  Serving up cereal and all your favorite 90's cartoons!
name: JANKY as FUCK

description: Pronounced "ogre", host of the BLASTO ray gun blaster shooting range & fireball gallery, Old Country Vodka Snorting, Xeni Cup street hockey game.
name: Kanuckistan OGRUR

description: Luv Club, where the sacred meets the profane. Ain't nothin' but luv in our heart and dancin' in our toes!
name: Luv Club

description: The Soup Kitchen: We are a group of volunteers/non-profit organization that utilizes littered bikes to make an impact in impoverished disaster zones. Our Camp, The Soup Kitchen is a place where you can soup up your two wheeled steel stallions, pick up your Art Bike Relief bikes for the event, go on crazy scavenger hunts for days or ride a tall bike.  We got all kinds of mischief going down. Find some lights and some spray paint so you can deck out your bikes right.
name: The Soup Kitchen

description: Join the elite group of Inflatable Wildlife Intelephants for Historical Readings, Bocce, a Pre-Sunrise Party, Unbirthday Party and Open Bars! Mingle, Lounge, Dance - The Inflatable Wildlife Intelephants bring the self-aware jungle to you!
name: Inflatable Wildlife Disco

description: Welcome To Vault 21!  We've survived the end of the world in our vault and have surfaced hundreds of years later to find a world completely new to us. Luckily we have the booze and the music they all lost when the world ended, so we're here to bring the party.
name: Vault 21+

description: We Camp Be Bothered to fill this out.
name: Camp Be Bothered

description:
The goal of Camp Fer Sherbert and its members is to nurture and be stewards of the ritual creative overlord spirit of Burning Man. We do this by having frosty vegan superfood treats to support the hundreds of dedicated artists, volunteers, and citizens in Black Rock City who build large-scale art installations on the playa in the heat of the midday sun. Through our reverently ridiculous expression of this service over the last three years as a placed theme camp, we have created interactivity of new friends, lovers, international treat-enthusiasts, and learned that spontaneous love transcends all spectators into divine interactivity!

It's like 'For Sure', but 'Fer Sherbert' :)
name: Raditude (Formerly Fer Sherbert)

description:
Using biofeedback, our aim is to engineer group flow through interactive, multi-sensory community art projects. 

Visual arts
-Easels, canvasses, brushes, paint, paper, and glitter will be provided to participants. 

Music 
-Heartbeats and brainwaves will be digitally channeled and amplified to create a live symphony of the scientific soul: "Biofeedback De La Banda." We will convert your biofeedback data into soundscapes and broadcast your personal frequencies at Black Rock City. 
-Using GPS satellites to synchronize musicians in remote areas without delay, selected participants located throughout Black Rock City will vibe out in a geographically-diverse jam session, synched with our Global Metronome.

Meditation with Biofeedback
name: Synchronicity

description:
EGGS Bar returns for 2018!
Building on years of well-honed playa experience, EGGS Bar crew of veteran burners will once again create a welcoming venue of deepest interaction.  A jewel on the playa; it is a beautifully designed bar with amazing artifacts. While disguised as a friendly tavern, the space we create is so much more than a place to grab a drink... a storytelling station, meeting place of the minds, incubator of adventures, spontaneous dance party spot, sometimes even a Burning Man debate forum. All that and so much more,  we are YOUR local on the playa!

"Center Camp stalwarts!" — Jack Rabbit Speaks
name: EGGS Bar

description: This is not your grab-and-go coffee shop but an immersive cafe experience where each cup is made with love. Take a break from the playa and enjoy the ritual of sipping tea or coffee from a handmade cup. We Serve Turkish coffee, matcha, masala chai, yerba mate, espresso, pour-over, cold brew, French press, kombucha, and a wide array of teas from around the world.
name: Cafe Diem

description: A shady place in your mind. An important step on your path to enlightenment is to stop by, relax and give your face an ego melting Dunkaroo. You'll leave wondering, "Who am I?"
name: Zen as Fuck

description: TRIFECTA emerged from the jumbled, bohemian streets of Montreal to bring joie de vivre to the playa. We're a perfect prime number, spinning our three-legged adventures far and wide. Bring your mind for stories; bring your body for Dusty Dick's Diner; and bring your soul for some good old-fashioned strip karaoke.
name: TRIFECTA

description:
Tribal Spirit is focused on visual UV art installation and electronic music. We are hosting a Straya Day (Australia Day on Tuesday for all Aussies and their friends)
We will be hosting number of workshops and we will have Yoga sessions 3 times throughout the week. Our space is also available for other burners, who wish to run own workshops.
Tribal Spirit will be repairing bicycles for other burners. 
Daily open bar with refreshing mixers.
name: Tribal Spirit

description: Camp While You're Up! We're a bi-coastal  group from D.C. and San Francisco who love music and art. Many of us enjoy DJing and music production. While you're up swing by for a drink, chill, dance, or just to say, "Hi".
name: While You're Up

description: We see the bottom of the muffin as a missed opportunity for glory, a place where tenderness is revealed and true colors shine. Let the Wheel of Destiny, our signature dish, show you the light inside your subconscious, as we delight you with an experience you won't soon forget.
name: Muffin Bottoms

description: Welcome to Camp Pendant, our Best Little Camp On The Playa! Come by and pick up one of this year's pendants, rest your weary feet, and tell us how your year has been. While you're here, don't forget to pay the *all new* Gifting Tree a visit. Whether you take a little something or leave a little something, she's here to make everyone's day a little brighter.
name: Camp Pendant

description: The Space Between's 6th year on the playa! Come by afternoons for boozie smoothies and groovie toonzies. We also have ping pong and a hidden Tokyo-style Saké bar select nights. Check the schedule for events!
name: The Space Between

description: Intergalactic space cowboys who unite under the lights of a disco ball suspended above the jaws of a shark
name: Disco Deserters
