description: Champagne Campaign will be hosting daily debates on diverse and fun topics while providing champagne, come vote for our topics with your mouth! Don't forget to stop by and get your Playa Prenup before your playa marriage! Join us in front of the temple 12:00 every sunrise for a toast to the new day. Come check out our 90s/00s MUSIC WITH WORDS party on Thursday - your ears will thank you!
name: Champagne Campaign

description: IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. We are gifting one-on-one 30 minute life coaching sessions, Monday thru Saturday to the people of the playa. Come work your shit out!
name: IMAGINEnation

description: Breath easy with the Maskman's quality N-95 dusk masks with their non toxic psychedelic Burning Man logo.  And don't forget our Breathe Pure nose plugs and BM stickers and pins.
name: A-PLAYA-MASK

description: Nourishing passerby's, radiating love and serving tea, beats and smiles to ALL. Intimacy and connection amidst the beautiful chaos of the playa. Join us for a Yoga & Brunch event perhaps, and/or stop by and hydrate yourself at our Tea Garden and Tea Lounge.
name: DusTea

description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man. Our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, commands your presence at his Slave Auctions and other debauched and glorious events.
name: Uli Baba & the Horny Thieves

description: Love Me Gender: you come for the ice shaken espresso, gender fluids and body painting; you stay for our loving, inclusive environment with flexible gender boundaries.
name: Love Me Gender

description: Camp Beaverton is an intentional, experimental, and experiential Burning Man community theme camp. We are a group of queer women/trans/genderqueer/lesbian/bisexual/heterosexual/etc... or folks who are simply as wayward as the playa is dusty. We celebrate sexuality, self exploration, and respect for one's journey on through this life. Our goal is to provide a safe space for queer women and trans folks on and off-Playa. We encourage education, participation, inquiry, conversation, and self-reflection. We extend our goals to the greater Black Rock community by hosting workshops and social events.
name: Beaverton

description: At Playa Glass we show you how to use the noontime sun to melt playa dust into glass. You can make jewelry out of your glass creation at our well stocked craft tables.
name: Playa Glass

description: Camp D5 - Dusty Dirt Dogs Dining at Dusk, This is your obedience destination.  Enjoy dogs nightly from evening until dusk and participate  in obedience training.  Visit the Dog Park OTC and get your fastest obstacle times noted on our prominently displayed leader board.
name: Camp D^5

description:
Part bar. Part theater. Part chill. Part Shoot Your Balls Off.
100% Awkward & Tawdry.
name: Awkward & Tawdry Lounge

description: Cult of the Magic Lady has all your classy and non classy needs!  From our Black Rock Self Service Abortion Clinic (where our motto is "We bring out the kid in you"... and who doesn't love a tasty jello shot filled fetus?) to our Parched Koi Lounge (with beautiful decorations and morning shameful danishes), we've got what you need.  Don't forget to swing by for a book from our lending library!
name: Cult of the Magic Lady

description: A neighborhood bar, playground and lounge open every afternoon that serves the most refreshing punch on the playa, to enjoy before or after playing foursquare or swinging on the swings. Ask nicely and we might give you a Love Puddle or whip out Dildo Jousting. We make sure passerby are assaulted with friendly invitations to join in the fun whenever we are open. Check out our events in the What Where When or just come by and look at our calendar to see when we're having Strip Rock Paper Scissors, sing alongs, and other ridiculous fun!
name: Love Puddle

description: Since 1995, the editors of the BRC Weekly have been publishing Black Rock City's favorite independent newspaper, chock full of snarky articles, opinionated editorials, and of course, the infamous Out/In List and Playa Lingo.
name: BRC WEEKLY newspaper

description: Bus stop resting station for Burner Express riders.  Water, shade, and a helping hand for weary travelers.
name: Camp Little Bitty

description:
The Warning, Not the Example. 
We are NOT a cult.
hometown: Black Rock City (San Francisco, CA, USA)
name: CAMP THREAT

description: Cypher is a community of artists who produce immersive audio visual meditations which interface performance, art, technology and music. Cypher is an emergent installation that fosters deep connection and healing through expansive art experiences.
name: CYPHER

description: Get a new, better Playa Name from our drunk Playa Name Robot. Get new, better nightmares and be horrified by our 100-strong Robot Gerbil Choir. Top it all off with a game of bocce ball and a drink at our cosy Bar De Nom.
name: Breakaway Republic

description:
Vikings (wannabe's), well crafted ales, drinking games, and great conversation!  Quenching burning thirsts since 2015!  

Stop by for a drink, stay because you like it.
hometown: Vancouver, BC   (part of Burn in the Forest Regional)
name: Viking Bar!

description:
Feeling the need to fiddle about? To blow, beat, or stroke on something? 
Come to MINSTREL CrAMP and get your creative "musical juices" flowing. We've got the best daily tuned piano on the Playa.
Stop in, Listen in, Join in, to some great live acoustic jamming with our house band "THE BURNING SENSATIONS".
This year we feature Belly Dancing, Acoustic Jam, Drumming Circle, Swing lessons, an iRobot dance and an iRobot themed art show.
Check the schedule board out front to see what's happening or sign-up for a slot to perform with your own band (or ours).
It's all good! Listeners/dancers welcome!
PS: We also have a large selection of legitimate "menstrual cramp" supplies if you have a urgent need.
name: MINSTREL CrAMP

description: A society of the Grandest of gentleman, carpetbaggers, confidence men, hustlers, swindlers and the greatest of all deceivers dedicated to the art and craft of snake oil salesmanship. During the day we offer a "safe space" for those who would like to practice their craft . Once a day we hold our competition. Dressed in their finest of garb, contestants bring their elixirs to exhibit, share and enchant with their tall tales and wild promises. (Signup at our booth and see "happenings" or our camp board for the content requirements for the day)
name: Grand SnakeOil Exhibitionist Soc.

description:
Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender norms. We create safer spaces for Trans, GenderQueers, & Gender Non-Conformers. We provide a welcoming place for those curious about gender play, mixing up one's gender, and general discussions on how gender impacts our lives. We'e a gender conscious open loving community into sparkles, theatrics, drag, running anti-oppression workshops, and making queer smoothies on playa.
Check us out at www.genderblenders.org
name: Gender Blender

description: Boutique, bowling and more games, science fiction books, Singing Trash Can Robots!  Trashy dance at sundown.
name: Tarwater

description: Love Bubble Camp: A Safe Haven for Human Connection, where participants can be "bubble wrapped" in loving kindness and compassion via our safe listening space/chill dome, workshops, and menu of connective offerings from our "Spice Rack." We aim to encourage and enhance self-discovery, inclusion and connectedness not only in our camp but in the entire Burning Man community, on and off playa.
name: Love Bubble

description: Dive into our colorful tropical island and sea environment featuring Darwin the turtle dome and Glitz the interactive LED jellyfish! Bonus: we have a really big swing.
name: Galapagos

description:
A Transformation Station ...

An art school, A cultural exchange hub, A place of learning and shaing ... & Gifting Galore
name: A Transformation Station

description: Costuming BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered. Home of the world-famous Sillisculpt Museum.
name: Reno Housewives

description: The end is nigh! Come bounce while you can upon the upholstered luxury of our Bungee Couch Garden (yep, exactly what it sounds like), sip the ambrosia of perpetual motion (champagne and 5­-hour energy, the official libation of our Ultimate Celebration, available 4-­6pm weekdays), and/or forget your impending doom as you puzzle over a painstakingly haphazard LED sculpture (8-9pm Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday). In short, if your vision of the apocalypse is as lazy and carefree as ours, we've got you covered!
name: Ultimate Celebration

description: Come hang out, grab a drink, enjoy an ecclectic music selection and shout "Yeah Man!".  Activities include dance parties, fire dancing, workshops and more.
name: Yeah Man!

description:
Don't be a Boar by yourself, come play with the Pigs! We've been hosting our famous daytime
party on the Playa since 2001. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary
we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the
squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas. All vegetarians are welcomed....to be converted.
It'll be sooieet!
name: Pigmalions

description: Heavy Petting Zoo Art Car Camp welcomes all species of animals and aliens. Inclusive! Expressive! Welcoming!
name: Heavy Petting Zoo

description: Jankytown features Live Music and Circus Arts - funk, jazz, samba, clowns and fire performance. An interactive creative space, stop by for open jams in the daytime and for evening performances by Jankytown artists.
name: Jankytown

description: Viking themed camp with interactive lounge, bar and interactive art projects and games.
name: Valhalla on the Playa

description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style.  Participate in our Experimental Grilled Cheese Theatre, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.
name: HomeSlice

description: Set your clocks for aloha time! We're going from Polynesian to Polyn-EASY. Lei Frik, c'est Tik! Mahalo.
name: Friki Tiki

description: The Dickstracted Camp is and adult-gay oriented camp emphasized on bringing exhibitionism and voyeurism to the playa.
name: Dickstracted Camp

description: El Tesoro:  a place for the weary souls (and soles) to unwind, have some delicious drinks, and dance to some amazing music selections.  El Tesoro is 'The Treasure' of BRC, come hang with us and play life size games such as Jenga, Connect Four, and Battleshots.
name: El Tesoro

description: Come by get stamped up with a man stamp and see what else we have to offer
name: Walk over

description:
"You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy." 
Obi-Wan Kenobi
name: Mos Eisley Village

description: Hunters of the golden bubblebutt, unite! Whether your bum is flat, bouncy, perky or juicy, saunter over to Booty Hunters for some quality boozy booty appreciation. Share a drink, pick out a pair of fabulous new booty shorts, learn how to twerk, stretch it out with yoga and shake it out with samba and groovy beats!
name: Booty Hunters

description: The shaded oasis of Black Rock City and home of ice-cold lavender towels.
name: Camp Kühloff

description:
Vamp Camp! Come visit the oldest Vampire bar at Burning Man!  
Enjoy our Vamp day and night time games or just chill by the fire! Let's tear it up!
name: Vamp Camp

description: Camp ZaZen the place to find peace on the playa and home to Elvis Espresso, come get your morning cup of JO!
name: Camp ZaZen

description: Bike trouble got ya down? Come visit the Bike Gods, where we practice self reliant bike repair 24 hours a day.  Our camp features 8 fully equipped workstations and spare parts. We have caring and compassionate bike mechanics to assist you M-F 10am-6pm.  Out on the Playa, look for our Bike Gods Taxi Service running yellow tandems and our famous Lanterne Rouge art car.
name: Bike Gods

description: Stop by Vandyland and show us your moves! Project your digital-self on to our 10ft screen and interact with mind blowing graphics for a unique dance experience. Take the spotlight with a solo performance or double team the screen.
name: Vandyland

description: Come join us in the revitalizing Ritual of Drinking Love-Infused Water. Replenish your soul and your water bottle at our 24-Hour Self-Serve Water Buffet. Recharge your body through the healing powers of our Reiki Masters -- as well as recharge your cell phone/device at our Solar-Powered Cell Phone Addiction Retox Station. Reinvigorate old and new friendships at our "Do Your Friend" Nail Polish Stations. The Life-Changing Power of Positive Ritual happens when YOU show up.
name: AquaZone Love Water Bar & Oasis

description: The Hibernaculum is a bat and cave-themed workshop space and a set of fun, interactive installations. The Hibernaculum provides physical activity and outdoor-themed workshops; a photo booth; and other fun cave-themed experiences.
hometown: Vancouver island; Colorado; California; the UK; Alberta; Mexico
name: Hibernaculum

description: Celebrating the traditions of ancient Greek sports, arts and philosophy with naked oil wrestling, competitions, yoga, pottery making and philosophical conversations in our Taverna.
name: Gymnasium

description: Slavic people come together over HERE
name: ##Darkart

description: TBD
name: Pookah Lounge/SNAFUBAR

description:
Do you enjoy legends, glitter, glamour, fruit, queerness ,and polyamory in epic proportions? If so, then come visit us at Rainbow Sparkle Peach (and the Legend of the Polyglamorous Queerdo). We offer advice, peachy keen hosting, cold fruit, hot kisses, and a whole hell of a lot more...

We love connecting, cuddling, storytelling, and maybe if you're lucky, you! Also of note, we are inclusive as fuck, leave your phobias behind and find a new way of lovin'...just sayin'...safe spaces for all!
name: Rainbow Sparkle Peach

description: An eclectic group of fuckers serving you an array of wierd fun!
name: FUCK YEAH!

description: Now in their 19th year, the sickest bastards on the playa are again making their presence felt.  Yes, the demented denizens of Barbie Death Village--complete with piano bar and wine bistro--are back to amaze and offend even the most jaded of burners.  Join us for a glass of Barbie burgundy, relax in the shade, or step up to the plate for Fizzball.  At Barbie Death Village, we know how to make you party.  And don't miss our exciting sub-camps, including (but not limited to): Black Rock City Body & Paint, Barbie Day Spa, Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Hookers & Makers, 13th Barbie, Clan O'Crash, Pizza Cats, and Rocket Pad.
name: Barbie Death Village

description: Camp Kin-Dza-Dza!, bringing space-junk dystopia and tea to the Playa since 2006!
name: Kin-Dza-Dza!

description: Deep Psyche is a fun, beautiful, shaded space for Visitors to drop in, grab a snack and cool drink, and give their psyches some reprieve.
name: Deep Psyche

description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.
name: Alborz

description: The BLD Village
name: BLD

description: Crossroads pumps out the best live music on the playa, verified by gods and science. Moon Cheese is the best grilled cheese camp on the playa according to YOUR MOUTH. Crossroads and The Moon Cheese Grill provides live music, delicious food, a sexy bar, a 30+ piece band, dancers, and post-show DJ's. Come dance your dusty self to sheer exhaustion and snag some cheesy-gooey-goodness and downtime in our sparkly star chill dome before it all disappears.
name: Crossroads & the MoonCheese Grill

description: A lounge style sound camp with time appropriate music, plenty of day beds, shade, smoothies, yoga, the finest of beats and lights that will knock your socks off.
name: Music Savages

description: At Tickled Mink  (... where everyone's a star!)  we are here to help zhuzh you at our Hollywood minkup mirror vanity before you start channeling your inner diva. If you don't know how, we'll teach you to smeyes like a mink, so once you sink into our fuzzy, plush, cerulean photo throne  ("... it's not just blue, it's not turquoise, it's not lapis, it's actually cerulean …")  you'll be oh so ready to strike a picture perfect pose as your cover page photo shoot begins. You've never looked more minktacular!
name: Tickled Mink

description: Adhering to the tenet that "What happens at Burning Man, stays at Burning Man", Down Low Club is a discreet, enclosed and air-cooled man-to-man playspace, exclusively for adult men 18+.  Open 24/7 all week with special daily events posted online.
name: Down Low Club

description: Come by the Octopus Garden to enjoy a salty treat and some Pussy Punch while we airbrush your body in our immersive blacklight garden to some smooth grooves... Though we love Pussy, we are not an orgy camp... yet
name: Octopus Garden

description: A place to get some shade, throw some shade, get your drink full and your hair fuller. Come play in all the ways. Inclusive in all the ways unless ur hair has gone sideways- then let's do something about that, honey. Sex positive. Leave your hangups on the doorknob.
name: THairAPY Salo(o)n

description: Hosting Tabletop games, dancing, food, and beverages served by a robot!
name: Black Rock City Science Center

description: What is your myth of self? Our camp holds up the mirror for self exploration of ones self ideals.
name: Decadance

description: Borsch Camp. Feel the taste of Ukraine
name: Borsch Camp

description: Popo Ville is about honoring our patron saint Popo, and how we contribute to making the world a better place one burn at a time.  We invite our fellow burners, new and returning, to join us for food, drink, music, games and friendship.
name: PopoVille

description: Enter CATWORLD, adult playground for cats, humans, and prey animals of all kinds.  Whether you wish to play with one of our human-sized cat toys, lounge in a box, or have a drink under the UV lights in the RAWR Bar and dance all night away to the best music on playa, CATWORLD humbly offers a wide range of cage-free entertainment to break up the monotony of the burn.  Had enough?  Got a problem posturing and hissing can't solve?  Come to our camp party for a DANCE BATTLE, or don one of our padded cat suits and sign up for CAT FIGHTS!
name: CATWORLD

description: The playas only authentic vintage Tiki Lounge straight out of the 1940's South Pacific!  Beware of cannibals!
name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge

description: Trade in your dusty tookus for a warm shot and a cold slap in the face or plow it up with a snowboardski or three, then try your hand at Jenga or Dildo Corn hole while puffin on a hookah!  Get that booty bouncin on our Trampolines! Afterwards cuddle up in our oasis puddle,  or just relax under hundreds of G-Strings!  Face it, out here, there's no escaping a Dusty Bumm!
name: Dusty Bumm

description: Beardhaus. Home of the Beard Love.
name: Beardhaus

description: The Kazbah is a 501c3 non profit organization with a focus on electronic music, visual art, architecture, and design.
name: Kazbah

description: There are no mistakes, only Happy Acidents! Come experience our Bob Ross and Chill Dome, 7pm-7am every night. In the words of the man himself: Let's get crazy.
name: Happy Acidents

description:
Bringing the gift of Fire to humanity since the dawn of time, Prometheatrics has been a part of Black Rock City since 2002. Historically located on the Esplanade, our theme camp hosts a fine collection of interactive installations and helpful hosts ready to surprise and delight you!

Step inside the temporally anomalous Tesseract, where you'll experience yourself as you truly are: infinite! Trace your face with our Self Portrait Studio and take home your masterpiece, or shoot a selfie in Clesthyra's Eye. Enjoy a bounce on our delightful Danpoline or enter the dream-space of the Infinitipi. On your way into or out of our domain, admire all the colors of Burning Man through the radiant Rainbow Scrim, or cast your fortune on our giant I-Ching.

Join us at dusk and dawn at our mirrored stage for twice-daily fire spinning jams, where there's always a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!
name: Prometheatrics

description: Hyperbole is a place for dreamers, artists, builders, makers, druids, reptaliens, time travelers, cynics and jokers...
name: Hyperbole

description: Mornings, come by "Cafe Data" for a delicious cup of freshly brewed coffee and see how much our big data already knows about you, then in the afternoon come by for hands-on Bicycle and Electronic (EL Wire/LED/Robot) repair.  Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.
name: Nose Fish

description:
Swig-N-Swing 
Come for a Swig or a Swing but not a swap if thats your thing.
name: Swig-N-Swing

description: Camp Hello, we love you! Is all about creating an incredible experience for you and your friends! Sound healing, Yoga, Psychedelic long exposure portraits, Workshops, ICE COLD Electrolyte drinks, A Vibrating dome with 5 interactive instruments that are connected to a sound infused floor that vibrates to the tones of the instruments that YOU play! Massage therapy, Tea, And a fire pit! Come say HELLO, because WE LOVE YOU already!
name: Hello, We Love you!

description: Funky Monkey Camp - Furthering Funky Merriment of Maniacal Monkeys Everywhere!
hometown: Truckee, CA, Durango, CO, Los Angeles, CA, Reno, NV, Sacramento, CA, Burlington, Ontario
name: Funky Monkey Camp

description:
ConTent presents: Beetlejuice Beach Party

Come jiggle your bones back to life at the "Dome of the Dead", or enjoy some activity at the "Volleyball Court for the Recently Deceased"!
name: ConTent

description: Que Viva! is a Burning Man camp of activists and artists of color dedicated to social justice and radical inclusion, bringing issues like racial justice and immigrant inclusion to the playa in a celebratory and magical way. Our camp leads hands on art workshops for Burners of all ages, hosts compelling art installations about human rights issues, facilitates workshops and group discussions about race and inclusion, and serves as a relaxing chill space for Burners.
name: Que Viva Camp

description: Spin and shake all the things at Vulcan Empire Monday - Friday under our shaded space, we have plenty of props for you to play with. No experience? No worries, we will teach you! Don't forget to stop by for out Monday night fire jam! Stop by camp to view our full schedule for the week!
name: Vulcan Empire

description: Black Rock Cities indoor New Wave Nightclub, bringing you "Music with Words" 8 nights in a row from 8pm to 4am, eight nights in a row from Opening Night through Temple Burn.
name: Planet Earth

description:
Bike broken and nowhere to turn?  Well, you may be 'all thumbs' but if at least two are opposable, we can help you fix it!  (And if not, we'll help you break it altogether!)  Here at Simian Akademy, our mission is to help you gain the skills necessary to adapt to today's dynamic, ever-changing playa environment.  Our dedicated team of trained monkeys will show you where it goes and how to work it.  If a trained monkey can do it, you can too!

Looking for a truly unique and interactive experience?  Come visit the Olfactorium where our Mistress of Scent will concoct a custom perfume just for you, based on your unique, personal preferences.

Feeling cranky from the heat?  Your new best friend getting on your nerves already?  You need to CHILL THE FUCK OUT AND COLOR!  Come visit our shaded dome to relax and color your frustrations away.  Choose your favorite, beautifully embellished swear word, or perhaps a picture of unicorns being total assholes!
name: Simian Akademy

description: The New Desert Outpost is an explorers' lounge and outpost, dedicated to inspiring wanderers to find their sense of adventure. Join us for afternoon tea or evening brandy; share your favorite adventures and get inspiration or direction for a new one!
name: New Desert Outpost

description: Share, Learn, Grow, Evolve - PlayaSkool is a global community of movers and shakers dedicated to creating positive impact through arts and education.  We are PlayaSkool!
name: Daydream

description: At the Secret Location, everyone has arrived! We invite one and all to join our "exclusive" society. Find us to unburden your secrets, lighten your heart, but most importantly, shake that ass. Omnia mea ut reveletur!
name: Secret Location

description:
The Blissfits "Retirement" Village is a motley crew of seasoned playa vets that have been building & contributing to the playa ethos for 10 to 20+ years. Blissfits campmates offer a more mellow, "Snarkle Pony", lighthearted fun, to the event. Our camp frontage hosts a, 24/7, Shuffle Board & Bocci Ball games and holds a daily tournament. There is plenty of comfy space to hang out and get cozy around a fire in the evening. 
Blissfits is also home to a friendly Bloody Mary & Quesadilla Bar where our campmates aim to please and will take great care of replenishing you along your journey! Namaste..and f ur day.
name: Blissfits Retirement Village

description: OONTZ OONTZ OONTZ!
name: Oontz Pouch

description: Greetings from the NeoSapiens(!), named as such since we're hoping that we're evolving from our prior Sapien brethren. Hailing from the coasts in both New York and Cali, come join us for transformative experiences over the course of the burn.
name: NeoSapiens

description: Camp Salty:  Day and night we are the local deep dive bar of the [9:00 neighborhood].  Nautical, underwater themed, we are your safe haven from the fervor of the playa playing R&B, Soul, Blues, Electro-swing, Hip Hop, and Disco.
name: Salty Jack's

description: Golden Guy Alley, a collection of micro spaces awaiting you.
name: Golden Guy

description: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet is Burning Man's leading provider of low-cost, high-quality soulmates since 1998. We offer quality name brand and private-label soulmates at substantially lower prices than can be found through conventional wholesale sources. Costco soulmates include many products unavailable at other soulmate chains and at substantially lower prices. With a large store and a huge inventory, we are able to offer a variety not found at other chains.
name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet

description: Tu aimes les crêpes ? Visit us to taste a crêpe that has nothing to do with what they told you a crêpe is...
name: Burning My Crêpe

description: At Ego Trip we want you looking and feeling your best! Get pampered at our beauty bar, capture that stunning playa outfit at our photo booth, dance to our sexy beats and get drunk on your own vanity (and our delicious drinks) until everyone looks as good as you!
name: Ego Trip

description: The Mudskipper Urban Decay Cafe is a close-knit, gay-friendly diverse camp with a history at burning man that goes back to 1993, Come chill out in our jungle themed smoothie cafe or get a finger & toe nail make over in our amazing Beauty Bar, all are welcome!!!!
name: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe

description: Tattoo, Chinese BBQ, Karaoke, Chinese alcohol and tea, electrical charger
name: China Village

description: Come bask in the shade of our fire-poofing volcano, and boogie to our ground-shaking beats while we serve you a refreshing iced libation. Don't forget to bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano god and be sure to search for the poofer trigger!  Poof!
name: Tectonic

description: Don't know why not ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
name: Squeebee's Yacht Club

description: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory.  We supply the paint and BM stencils.  You supply the clothing, gear, or body to create your BM memory. Totally interactive, quick, easy, and fun.  Open 24/7.
name: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory

description: Explore the outer city and turn the volume down!  Escape to one of our parties and enjoy one of our many events including Genital Prints, Nacho Daddies, Whiskey Galore and Drive Thru!  Ever have someone say you were gonna lose your Gay Card only to realize you don't have one? Get one @ Burner Buddies.
name: Burner Buddies

description: Rising Up out of the Chaos of the Default World comes your Beacon of Hope:  Camp Upsie Dasium!  Featuring a 45 foot high climbable Tower, Silhouette Theater, over 1500 sq ft of Shade, Live Music and Tastings. Come Climb the Tower and Enjoy the View of BRC. We are open to Burners who want to use our camp for small events.
name: Camp Upsie Dasium

description: Above the Limit is an all-inclusive camp filled with a love for collaborative music, coffee, and the ocean.
name: Above The Limit (ATL)

description: BRC Erections.  Bringing towers and taquitos to the playa.
name: BRC Erections

description: Undersea Oasis of fire!  Join us for our daily fire spinning lessons and our nights of fire!  Firebase ball tuesday after dark and late wednesday for fire dodgeball.  Our playground equipment is open 24/7 but one new piece will be operated by zoomer direction only.  Of just chill in our bubble lounge or black light snail dome.
name: !Zoom!

description: Have angst against another fellow robot? Come duke it out at the one and only Black Rock Em' Sock Em'!
name: Camp Against The Machine

description: Welcome to CowTown, part of the Cascade Coalition!  We welcome you to join us in our barn for a rousing game of poker, a hot bowl of miso, some delectable tunes, and libations to wash it all down.
name: CowTown

description: Running Amok? Find your tropical oasis on the playa and stop by to chill, relax and enjoy well crafted rum cocktails with us!
name: Rum Amok

description: Home Camp presents Sky Mandala Par-tea, Californian built Sky mandalas adorn our camp where English Tea is served to make you feel at Home. We are a US/UK based theme camp that wants to represent Home for both our cultures and unite our friendship that was created at Black Rock City.
name: Home Camp Presents Mandala ParTea

description:
Lumber-J Camp
Escape from a world ruled by machines and step into a playground challenging human strength and cunning. Look for the plaid and engage a contest or two where dust becomes snow.  Learn some useful knots or join us for storytelling around the campfire.
name: Fade to White

description:
Flirt Camp is a vibrant and fun lounge for folks to learn and practice the art of flirting.  

Our goal is to empower Burners with the knowledge, and more importantly, experience, with how to flirt, and ultimately building amazing relationships with that knowledge!  Flirt Camp is a community of folks who study spirituality in the context of sensuality and relationship, as well as other transformational modalities.  We see flirting as an essential part of going from strangers to lovers, and we all love listening and teaching.  Flirt Camp an inclusive camp, so please feel free to drop by!!
name: Flirt Camp

description: The FUN-DO BAR is all about having fun and fondue. Come eat cheese and chocolate with us in the afternoon, play games and listen to people play music!
name: FUN-DO BAR

description: Come form new [neural] connections at Campus Callosum. Bring your most nagging questions or share your own scientific knowledge, and if you don't leave the camp smarter at least you'll leave drunker.
name: Campus Callosum

description: Welcome to The Goonies! Where your childhood freedoms collides with the best part of adulthood in one giant SLAP of the Goon bag. We've simply paired our loved for bagged wine with the adventurous spirit of kids on the hunt for hidden treasure. Come visit our camp to remember the forts you used to make as a kid and share in the booty that we call goon.
name: The Goonies

description: Greetings dirty desert dwellers! We are Astral Headwash and we are back for our 21st trip to the playa! We will wash your beautiful dust filled head for you again this year. That's right, clean, fresh water warmed in the desert sun with wonderful smelling shampoo and a bit of leave-in condition to send you on your way! Bring your happy selves to us for first come - first served amazing pampering; Monday – Friday noon until 4 pm! Participation is required!
name: Astral Headwash

description: Lingerie Lounge - We will adorn you and adore you, fulfilling all your lingerie and costume needs! We have a huge inventory of hand-picked, sewn and dyed items, and our attentive camp members will find just the right item for you. Come see us for lingerie and other fabulous and festive items! We serve all sizes, ages, genders, gender identities, gender preferences, race, creed, religion, and color! Our goal is to remind each Burner who visits us that they are beautiful. Open M-F, 10-2.
name: Lingerie Lounge

description:
"You cannot pass," he said. "I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. You cannot pass. The dark fire will not avail you, flame of Udûn. Go back to the Shadow! You cannot pass." 

Visit our community of wizards for magical potions, read a book in our library, and learn to wield the power of fire!
name: Servants of the Secret Fire

description: Can you beat the camp Dart-O-Matic dart pro? Probably not; come play darts anyway with a few Marin Dart League players and their friends.
name: Dart-O-Matic

description:
PLAYA NAME HELP provides meaningful Playa Names for Black Rock City citizens. 

Visit us for a perfect Playa Name. 

You can also be a Playa Namer. We have what you need to do it right. 

Just show up when you want to name or be-named, during the daylight.

Un-naming prior poorly-chosen Playa Names is possible, but ours are permanent so only name or be named when you are ready and willing.
name: Playa Name Help

description:
The World War One Flying Ace once said "The Red Baron is wise. He doesn't stay up all night dancing and drinking root beer."  That was a clever ruse. 100 years ago, the legendary Red Baron escaped for a day with his nemesis--the Ace himself--to go drink absinthe and root beer with the bohemians. Some say, he never really came back... 

The Green Hour Root Beer and Absinthe Canteen returns to Black Rock City serving the Baron's legendary original-recipe absinthe to adults during the hour after sunset, and ice cold root beer and other old-timey nonalcoholic refreshments to participants of all ages throughout the day. 

Come visit us to talk about absinthe, meet the fairies, or dunk your whiskers in the coldest ginger beer on the playa, chill with us for awhile and let us help you enjoy your day.   We are a Leave No Trace camp, so, please bring your own drinking container. We do not serve alcohol to minors.
name: The Green Hour

description: Sextant believes that certain things must be done, even if they come at great cost and personal sacrifice. Come help us build the city of dreams, and In 2019, come help us build the Queen of Black Rock City.
name: Sextant

description:
Ukraine is very radical: we have gone through Chernobyl, we gave this planet its largest aircraft and two Klitschko brothers. It is important for us to introduce Ukraine as radically good. This means that we should dispense with references to our radical achievements, but don't go unnoticed! 

Cossacks, our heroic ancestors, really loved to fight. When the opportunity arose, the Cossacks gathered from all over Ukraine in a secret place and organized their life in a very strange way: think of something between a pirate's lair and the Shaolin monastery. 

As burners do, Cossacks from different regions of Ukraine settled camps together, and each camp was called 'Kooren.' This ancient word is saved as the name of one of the most remote areas of modern Kyiv called Kurenivka. So we call our Ukrainian camp Kurenivka!
name: Kurenivka

description:
Do you think of yourself as a Proper Burner? Have you always wanted to become a Proper Burner? Stop by CampProper to take your Proper Burner exam and earn your Burner License while enjoying some ProperTea! Think you can pass the exam? Stop by and find out! Oh…and we have some proper beats throughout the week at our ProperTea Dance parties. 

CampProper espouses the virtues of being a proper burner. We are an LGBTQ+ welcoming space for all citizens of Black Rock City who might want to become a little more proper.
name: CampProper

description: All the classes you wish were available when you were in school -- Black Rock School of Consensual Kink (S.O.C.K.) offers a variety of classes and BDSM tastings by our faculty of trained kinksters. The kink curious of all genders, orientations, and identities (18+) are welcome, see you in class!
name: School of Consensual Kink

description:
Cubhouse brings house party vibes to the Playa. Music, dancing, games and best of all good company.

YUNG ANIMAL SQUAD // NEVER LEFT ALWAYS RIGHT 
"Mi casa, su casa. That's our cosa nostra"
name: Cubhouse

description: Camp Start to Finish is an interactive open to anyone fictional extreme racing camp where participants, passers by and those that give in to our fun spirited peer-pressure can take place in made up events like NO distance running, walking, and cycling races that start and end on the same Start/Finish line. Warm ups, pre-race preparation, event participation and post race cool downs will be celebrated and encouraged by cheering fans, libations, and music from little know DJ's. "Winners'" will be presented with a super cool 2018 Camp Start to Finish metal as they stand a top the podium and bask in their glory of the victory in their head!!!
name: Start to Finish

description: WANTED: Dusty, hungry Burners in search of a hot, steaming bowl of deliciousness!!!  We're serving LATE NIGHT bowls of pho (noodle soup) from 10pm-1am. BYOBowl and utensils :)
name: Friend or Pho

description: Swing by the Possible Project's "Photopolis" for refreshments, music and instant photographs. Rest and refill your canteen any time at the PhotOasis, and visit our Art-o-Mat, where you can photograph a mood in a moment and take it with you.
name: Possible Project

description: Our five psychedelic neon Saturn rings represent the Olympic ideals of Friendship, Respect, Inspiration, Courage, and most of all - THE TAKING PART - all the kind of characteristics we all like to see at Burning Man!
name: 2049 Olympics

description: Camp Aroma will embody the healing powers of aromatherapy along with music therapy, meditation and human touch.
name: Aroma Camp

description:
You like Bailey's? Yea, we do too. It's salty, creamy beige. Mmmm...creamy.
Come get funky with us at Camp Old Gregg, where the Bailey's, creamy..., is free flowing, and the funk music is happening! Manginas and tutus are encouraged and accepted!
name: Old Gregg's Place

description: Come visit The Museum and play in our virtual reality sandbox, ignite your wishes into the Universe with our Fiery Flowers and Zen Garden, ground yourself in the Peace Palace or grab a tasty beverage, served with a smile, in our bar and relax in our hammock lounge.
name: Plunderground

description:
AmaZONE camp is a community of Brazilian artists and dream builders. We are an international family creating inspirational and positive experiences.
This year we continue our mission of providing interaction to the city and bring our honoraria art project "The Altar of Intentions". It aims to capture the energy of the Burning Man, thanks to the help of the Masaru Emoto Institute.  The Altar collects intentions of thousands of people and proves that the "reality" is a state of mind.
name: AmaZONE

description:
BMIR- Burning Man Information Radio  94.5 FM
Black Rock City's official radio station.  The Voice of The Man

Tune it to BMIR for theme camp event announcements, entertainment, traffic, weather, burn info and important official Black Rock City announcements.  We also stream on the internet at www.bmir.org and will start broadcasting live from the playa on Monday 8/20
name: Burning Man Information Radio

description: We are the staff support camp and training center for the Temple Guardians.  Our principal responsibility is providing training and volunteers for Temple Guardians shifts.
name: Temple Guardians Camp

description: Ranger Outpost Berlin
name: Ranger Outpost Berlin

description: Feeling out of sorts and looking for a place to recoup? Zendo volunteers are available 24/7 to offer psychological peer support and education for drug-related concerns. Come by our open-air yurts near 5:30 Rampart/ESD/RHQ stations.
name: Zendo Project

description: BLM staffs the Law Enforcement Substation to allow participants a convenient place to report crimes, ask questions, and provide information to law enforcement.
name: Law Enforcement Substation

description: Rangers Headquarters
name: Ranger Headquarters

description: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo

description: The Black Hole is the official staff camp on operational center of the Black Rock City Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department
name: The Black Hole

description: Come by any time to enjoy our collection of Burner Art created by camp members and local Burners. See what creative minds have made for you to enjoy. If you have art that you created and to have displayed you can bring it by to add to the collection. Please, be respectful of the artists that have contributed to create this display and do not vandalize or steal from the art center.  Thank you.
name: Sin City Art Center

description:
Introductions to BDSM through an electronic quiz and optional personalized instruction in the Playfully Yours Village dungeons.

Also hosts the very popular Cool Mist Experience automated cooling misting booth with pleasant surprises.
hometown: San Francisco South Bay Area (Cupertino, CA)
name: Bad Boy Camp

description: Glowskull Asylum Int'l brings heavy metal and rock radical inclusion to the playa.  Are you craving some good headbanging and want to meet exotic misfits from random places all over the world?  Our bar, SkØllushery, and art car "Castle Glowskull" will be hosting mischief, ultra-violence, and METAL (and other forms of rock) daily!
name: Glowskull Asylum Int'l

description: A Shack of Sit, where Sit happens!  At various times throughout the week you can come and get braided, painted, tattooed, Embigginated, projected, photographed, entertained, and relaxed. We are home to great conversation and fun activities. Please check the What When Where for scheduled activities! Your chair is always waiting!
name: A Shack of Sit

description:
We're not Doctors.

Looking for a rich full day? Come to the least disciplined military unit on the playa.
Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show, this year featuring films from the series. Signpost project open to all.

Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis, PBR, and maybe even grape Nehi at Rosie's Bar. Our new tea house offers a moment of calm in the wilds of Black Rock.

Life, liberty, and the pursuit of Happy Hour.
name: M*A*S*H 4207th

description: The Burning Band, the playa's first silly marching band.
name: Burning Band

description: Drive-By Theatre brings you the best classic cinema of yesteryear.  At night.  And zebra-esque sectional couches.  To sit on.
name: Drive-By Theatre

description: Sietch Jacurutu is a Dune themed camp which offers daily sword instruction and nightly fire sword battles.  Come learn the weirding way from the Fremen masters, then come back later and get weird.
name: Sietch Jacurutu

description:
Comfort Cabaret Performance Venue-come learn, laugh and live
KonaZona Coffee Shack-Hawaiian Java served hot and cold
name: SeaWEED/KonaZona Camps

description: Trading booth, hookah, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Chill space open 24/7. Come and find what you're looking for...
name: Magic Lantern Society

description: Part of BAAAHS Village — the homo-licious home on the range to BAAAHS, the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep — we're a group of booty rams here to give you no-frills Sheep Thrills! Be sure to stop by during the 15th Annual Naked Pub Crawl (Wednesday from 11am) for hard drinks, shear delight, and an opportunity to knock hooves in our pleasure pasture — or find us wherever you see the giant sheep mutant vehicle on the playa!
name: Sheep Thrills

description: We Can't Pace Ourselves
name: Perky Parts

description: The Black Rock Piano lounge is a place where people from all over the world come to meet, enjoy and play great live music.  We bring two of the best piano's to the playa (and tune them several times throughout the week) in one of the coolest and most comfortable lounges.  Live music is played by any fellow Burner who stops by to share their talent.  Music plays 24 hours a day and we host parties throughout the week.
name: Black Rock Piano Lounge

description: The Dirty Beetles seek to provide an all-inclusive space of positivity and creativity; to welcome strangers and family alike with soundtracks of danceable beats, vibes of love and boogie, and an inviting space where people want to be.
name: Dirty Beetles

description: The Association Sparkle Pony Care and Assistance (ASPCA) is a group of friendly and outgoing burners of all ages (5 to 50-something) who like to provide safe and welcoming spaces for all: our lounge is open 24/7 with shady respite from the sun and comfy seating and pillows to relax on, our hydration station will offer water and electrolyte drink mix and is kept stocked all day, and our fresh fruit stand will be restocked every afternoon. If you stop by at the right time, we might even be making quesadillas and would love for you to join us for a snack!
name: ASPCA

description: Bringing you the best music news and commentary on your FM dial for 19 years on the playa. Tune in during the event for music, news, mayhem, and commentary. Theme camps and artists are always welcome to drop off Public Service announcements about interactive events and projects they wish to have everyone know about.
name: Radio Electra

description:
The world famous Voted Best Camp once again gets suited up to hit your inner punk rocker that flat-lined LONG ago with the defibrillator. 
Live Punk Rock, skateboarding, and an open bar presented in a contemporary "In your face" style, it will be our honor and privilege to mop the floor with you in all areas of conversation in addition to making you look like merely a moderate drinker. Enjoy!
name: Voted Best Camp

description:
mis-fit: a person whose behavior or attitude sets them apart from others in an uncomfortably, conspicuous way. "a motley collection of social mistfits";
synonyms: nonconformist, eccentric, maverick, individualist, square peg in a round hole. The Mighty Misfits is a camp that celebrates the misfit in everyone. Check our listings for events and join us to celebrate the misfit in you.
name: Mighty Misfits

description: Celebrate 11:11--11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It's a totally vertical moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11
name: Camp 11:11

description: Excitement Action Team (EAT) started in San Francisco as a group centered around a simple theme: family style dinners coupled with games and a playful attitude. We've grown a community centered around the family meal, as nourishment, as ritual, and as a way to call friend-family home. We attend Burning Man as a Magical Encampment (ME).
name: Camp EAT Me

description: S'MORES every night at sundown (7pm).  Children of all ages are invited to roast a marshmallow and make a chocolate S'more.  Campfire entertainers are encouraged.  Doctor Who eats S'mores with us, will you?  Marshmallows will be burned!
name: S'mores N Amour

description:
Camp Mystic has a 20 year history at burning man. 
BY DAY... we host a Visionary Speaker Series themed 'The New Story of Humanity's Evolution' and healers and lucia light in our Dome.
BY NIGHT... we host some of the most talented artists, musicians, performers, fire spinners, aerialists, and singers during our Wednesday, Friday, & Saturday Night events themed 'A Transmission of Truth & Beauty'... truly magical.
Our award winning mutant vehicle The Mystic Flyer can be seen on the streets of the playa lit by 1200 LED lights encased on beautiful visionary playing incredible tunes on our roof deck.
name: Camp Mystic

description: A neighborhood favorite, BRCU is 3,000 square foot, shaded, 24-hour bar, serving a different craft cocktail each day. Come relax in the shade with a refreshing drink, snuggle up for a nap in one of our cuddle puddles, enjoy music you actually know the words to, jump on our trampoline, or just hang out with us at the bar - we're terribly charming conversationalists.
name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning

description: The Lazy Ass Fuckers are back in their lackadaisical glory. Come chill in our neon dome, relaxation station or drum circle. Or just stop by for some lazy ass laughs!
hometown: New Orleans, Buffalo, Yellowknife, Israel, Florida, Puerto Rico, Pittsburgh, Italy, Long Beach, Lake Tahoe, Los Angeles,
name: LAFer Camp

description:
This is a sacred space for self-actualization and flow. We've built a space for everyone to lose their inhibitions and become the best versions of themselves. We're a family and community, an LA/SF-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing badass parties as much as we love to connect on deeper levels. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with deep love and respect on the 10 Principles of Burning Man, that create interactive experiences and magic together.

Play is good for the soul - come meditate, do yoga, boogie down, play with fire, learn to spin (contact and dragon staff, poi, hoops, fans, palm torches, levitation wand, rope dart), fly on an aerial rig, party 'til the break of dawn, jam out, or whatever else your heart desires. Bring your best vibes!
name: Rude Awakening

description: Where the Build-A-Bot art support team hangs their helmets.
name: Boom Bots

description: Hexayurts built carelessly. Shade structures destroyed in a dust storm. Over-eager shirtcockers. These are all examples of one thing: reckless erections.
name: Reckless Erection

description: We are the Temple Crew - Please join us to give thanks and praise to our community.
name: Galaxia

description: Camp Babe is an art support camp with fun and outgoing characters from Colorado, Utah, California, Hawaii, and then some. Looking for a good conversation or a fun adventure? Stop on by!
name: Camp Babe

description: Disciples of the Dust have been bringing art to the playa for 7/10th of a decade.  We are a Pacific Northwest based camp.  Projects this year include I Robot Weather Plus and I Bouquet.
name: Disciples of the Dust

description: Art Support Camp for the Puddletown Panorama, the C.S. Tere and The Museum of the Broken.
name: Camp PtP/C.S. Tere/MOTBroken

description: This is the Art Support Camp for the Cosmic Stellarator Installation.
name: Cosmic Connection

description: Artists Ghetto
name: Artists Ghetto

description: Home to the Iron Monkeys, who made OVER|GROWN
name: Iron Monkeys

description: We are an Art Support Camp for In Case We Miss Each Other.
name: In Case We Miss Each Other

description:
Wirrarika camp is made up of a group of friends that will support the Ichiro, Sacred Beings art installation. All of us we will be in charge of all the items that integrates the art installation. 

In our camp we'll have:
- 4 RV's
- 5 tents
- 1electricity generator

All of us are very close and share similar interests for travel, the arts, food and music. 

We decided to collaborate to make this camp, share it with the world and showcase our friend´s work from Mexico and Italy. 

The art installation consist in a replica of the Velafrons Coahuilensis and a head of a T. Rex covered in multi-colored beads in the style of the Huichol Indian.
name: Wirrarika

description: Camp To Be Continued... is the home of the Art To Be Continued... collective. We enjoy cold beverages, delicious food, good laughs and beautiful art.
name: Camp To Be Continued...

description:
Not The Center of Attention Camp is an art support camp for The Center of Attention, an interactive piece where people will get attention, give attention and pay attention, each of us being the center of attention and then not the center of attention in the center of The Center of Attention. 

We are currently based out of Colorado, with people coming aboard from NY, Georgia, Oregon and California as of this moment. We are collecting volunteers to help us staff the project throughout the week. So, get over here! Contact David at vegetabledumplings@yahoo.com Cheers!!
name: Not The Center of Attention Camp

description:
The mission of Intrepid Arts is to manifest novel artistic intentions and to inspire the exchange of self actualized social consciousness.

Vision: Intrepid Arts will bring radical artwork and experiences to people in novel forms that will uplift the human spirit, inspiring community building based on self-actualized participation and personal engagement with the larger world.
name: Intrepid Arts

description: Hexatron art support camp
name: Hexacamp

description: Help us light OUR city! Every day at 5pm, join us in our procession and help light our City! Lighting the city without fail since 1993!
name: LampLighters

description: Lamplighters, longest running project on the Playa. Come over everyday at 5pm to help light OUR city!
name: Lamplighters

description: FreeStyle Palace 2018: Playa Talent Incubator.  Now in its second decade, a collaborative music play space and sound stage featuring Live Open Jams and nightly DJ and Hip Hop shows from sunset to about 2:00 am. Our stage and our microphones are open to all comers. Part alchemy and part black magic, FreeStyle Palace is an amalgam of sophisticated and authentic Urban Underground music and culture forged by the heat of the Black Rock Desert and polished by the collective talent of the Burning Man Community.
name: FreeStyle Palace

description: We bring a taste of San Francisco's Mission District to Black Rock City! Mission Country Club is an organically-grown camp, consisting of folks from San Francisco, Reno, Los Angeles, Washington DC, Boston, New York, Seattle, Portland, Ireland, Germany, Belgium and beyond. 2017 will be our 15th year on the playa as an organized camp. Over the years we've been home to Flannagan's Pub, Flannagan's Tacos + Whiskey, the Magic Kurry Cart, the Sangria Soundclash, the BRC Hip-Hop Playa Ball, the Brian Brunch and Bugaboo the art car. Don't forget to check the book for our 2018 shenanigans... we're going to be turning things up a notch for our 15th Anniversary!
name: Mission Country Club

description: Hellfire Society is a place where people can come flow and learn from some of the most passionate fire artists in the world, all in one place! We will host numerous classes from fire flow to aerial and yoga throughout the day. We have plenty of hang out space and a bar. Getting some conclaves and other flow artists together in one big space is a great opportunity to collaborate on playa events such as fire parades throughout the city, and deep playa renegade spins. Our mission is to really light up each night and bring something special to the playa for everyone to enjoy.
name: Hellfire Society

description:
Too hot? Too cold? Partied out? Need a break? Need a cuddle or two? Or ten?

You've come to the right place.

Cuddle Oasis is bringing you the best chillaxation and rechargation on the playa. Hang with us, stay a while, get misted, do some yoga, take a party nap, rejuvenate your senses with our fresh tropical drinks, and let us liven up your spirits with our chill tropical tunes.

Now you are ready carry on with your burn.
name: Cuddle Oasis

description: Come over to our exclusive facility. We provide the best equipment and instruction there is for creative essence, existential growth, and Polegasms!
name: Polegasm

description:
Drop in anytime and share our great views, Mimosa bar, themed parties, art and chill space or just warm up by the fire and watch the fire spinners & pyros go to work.
 http://do-more-now.com/
name: Do More Now (Firehouse)

description: Home to long-distance Camps since 2000! Experience our unique blend of small-scale one-on-one interactivity.
name: Snowflake Village

description: We teach and demonstrate how to properly tie down your tent, shade structures, as well as tying down your RV and truck loads for the journey home.
name: Tie It Down Camp

description: Come look at the moon, Jupiter, and Orion, our name sake, at night. Bring the kids.
name: black rock astronomical society

description:
Home of the One Ring (L2K, L3K, L4K)
Come visit our daytime open workshop for LED lighting.
name: One Ring (around the man)

description: SPECTRA: The Prism of Perpetual Enlightenment...She can move cosmic matter separating the frequency of white light into a spectrum of colors.  Experience the playa within a sacred universal symbol from the ancient future that radiates positivity, acceptance and love.
name: Mothership

description: Missed us on the Playa? Stop by and say "hi" when the Whomp Wagon and the Lion's Den are parked at our camp.
name: The Whomp Den

description: Nomad Lounge serving Ramen and Hot Towels with Pot Tong
name: CAMP COCKATOO

description: OHM HOME: Home of Triptobot, Samantha Ray, CrabWolf and OhmKar. We like to boogie!!!!!!
name: OHM HOME

description: Created by the Yellowstone Burners, Saddle Up! is a mutant vehicle based on a school bus, designed to look like a 30 foot tall saddle. The upper deck features The Watering Hole saloon where we will serve electrolyte drinks, teas, and good 'ol plain water. Join us for a unique western experience and get re-hydrated before moving on to your next adventure. We can't wait to Saddle Up! with our fellow Black Rock Citizens.
name: Yellowstone Burners

description: The home base for the legendary Magic Flying Carpet, the widely beloved ride enjoyed by thousands for 18 years now.  If you end up swooping in to Carpet Camp after an epic magic carpet ride, feel free to hang out with us in our shady spot.  If you're not lucky, get seduced by some sweet treats from the infamous Free Candy van.
name: Carpet Camp

description:
Last year's Burning Man theme of Radical Ritual spurred us to create a Mutant Vehicle, a radical rolling church built on a truck frame floating around the desert with a mushroom-topped spire… The Church of the Open Mind! What a journey…

In 2017, we conceived and built a Rolling Church with a large tower emerging out of the Spire. This marks the visual centerpiece of our mutant vehicle — a vividly colored, radically-illuminated mushroom. It stands vibrant, 30 feet up and visible from afar. This Mushroom on a Church, The Tree of Life or A Light in the Sky; we invite all interpretations.
name: The Church of the Open Mind

description: Surly Camp is the home to the SurlyBird double decker art car. She first debuted on the playa in 2003 and has undergone some amazing and imaginative transformations since then.
name: Surly Camp

description: Out and about in the desert, find us - humans  and robots alike - dancing, communing, defying the boundaries of our consciousness aboard the Robot Warrior. Ride alongside our robot SWARM. Perhaps become one yourself. And if you seek to further plumb the depths of whichever consciousness you embody, join us back at our camp. Within our pyramid, find deep relaxation and an even deeper and mystifying incarnation.
name: Robot Warrior

description: Arabella lives here.
name: Arabella's Lair

description: Please reference Mutant Vehicle Questionnaire.
name: Panda Camp
